original: atra sa iti yaḥ prakrānta ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: atra saḥ iti yaḥ prakrāntaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: upāttavastv iti vakṣyamāṇaśloke ko 'pīti yad upāttaṃ vastu tadviṣayatvenety arthaḥ /
analyzed: upātta vastu iti vakṣyamāṇa śloke kaḥ pi iti yat upāttam vastu tad viṣayatvena iti arthaḥ
asya upakrama upasaṃhārasya prakrānta vastu viṣayasya

original: tacchabdāt prayogātiprasaṅganiyamaṃ prakāśayan parihāryaṃ viṣayaṃ pradarśayati /
analyzed: tad śabdāt prayoga atiprasaṅga niyamam prakāśayan parihāryam viṣayam pradarśayati
yaḥ tu eka vākyaḥ iti
eka vākya grahaṇena parāmamṛśyasya pratyakṣāyamāṇa tā uktā
tatas ca vākya bhede na doṣaḥ

original: kartṛtveneti prādhānyaṃ sūcayati aprādhānyasya parāmarśo na duṣyatīti khyāpanārtham /
analyzed: kartṛ tvena iti prādhānyam sūcayati aprādhānyasya parāmarśaḥ na duṣyati iti khyāpana artham
saḥ iti arthaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ
tebhyaḥ iti kartṛ tva vācakāt idam ādibhyaḥ ca
asau tad śabdaḥ

original: asamanvayād iti tacchabdasya parokṣārthapratipādakatve saṃbandhavirodhād ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: asamanvayāt iti tad śabdasya parokṣa artha pratipādaka tve saṃbandha virodhāt iti arthaḥ
tādātmyāya iti
śaśi kalā mauli sva rūpa tvāya iti arthaḥ
ārthaḥ iti upakrama upasaṃhāra kramāḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ
kalpita tad krama ādi iti

original: kalpitaṃ tad yac chabdanirdiṣṭaṃ karmādi viṣayo 'syeti yacchabdārthaḥ karmakaraṇāditayā viṣayatvenāsya kalpita ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: kalpitam tat yat śabda nirdiṣṭam karma ādi yad śabda arthaḥ karma karaṇa ādi tayā viṣaya tvena asya kalpitaḥ iti arthaḥ
saṃbandha dvaividhyā iti śābda artha bhedena dvaividhyam
yat tat iti

original: yacchabdasamīpe samānādhikaraṇas tacchabda upādīyamānaḥ śabdaśaktisvābhāvyāt prasiddhavastuviṣayaṃ yacchabam ākāṅkṣati /
analyzed: yad śabda samīpe samāna adhikaraṇaḥ tad śabdaḥ upādīyamānaḥ śabda śakti svābhāvyāt prasiddha vastu viṣayam yad śabam ākāṅkṣati

original: vaiyadhikaraṇyena vyavadhānena ca nirdeśe tu nirdiṣṭenaiva yadā samanvayaṃ bhajate /
analyzed: vaiyadhikaraṇyena vyavadhānena ca nirdeśe tu nirdiṣṭena eva yadā samanvayam bhajate
na kevalam yaḥ upabhāṣate

original: śṛṇoti tasmād api yaḥ sa pāpabhāg ity atra yady api yaḥ sa iti yattador nairantaryeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyena ca nirdeśaḥ,
analyzed: śṛṇoti tasmāt api yaḥ sa pāpa bhāj iti atra yadī api yaḥ saḥ iti yad tadoḥ nairantaryeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyena ca nirdeśaḥ

original: tathāpi na yat tad ūrjitam iti nyāyena tacchabdo yacchabdāntaraṃ praty apekṣāyām iha yadi tacchabdo nirantaropāttayacchabdāpekṣayaiva prayujyate,
analyzed: tathā api na yat tat ūrjitam iti nyāyena tad śabdaḥ yad śabda antaram prati apekṣāyām iha yadi tad śabdaḥ nirantara upātta yad śabda apekṣayā eva prayujyate
tadā syāt eṣa doṣaḥ

original: yāvatā na kevalaṃ ya ity atra yacchabdāpekṣayā vyavadhānena prādhānyāt prayuktas
analyzed: yāvatā na kevalam yaḥ iti atra yad śabda apekṣayā vyavadhānena prādhānyāt prayuktaḥ
tad śabda antara an ākāṅkṣaḥ prasaṅgena nirantara nirdiṣṭa yad śabda anvayam bhajamānaḥ pūrva saṃskāreṇa
na tat śabda antaram ākāṅkṣati iti anavadyam etat

original: tad itthaṃ yattador upakramopasaṃhārakramo dvividhaḥ parighaṭitaḥ /
analyzed: tat ittham yad tadoḥ upakrama upasaṃhāra kramaḥ dvividhaḥ parighaṭitaḥ

original: sa cātra śloke na yujyata ity āha - evaṃ ceti /
analyzed: sa ca atra śloke na yujyate iti āha evam ca iti
tad upādāne iti

original: yacchabdo nātra tad eti prakrāntas tacchabdaḥ parāmṛśyate tatsaṃbandhapratītāv ity arthaḥ.
analyzed: yad śabdaḥ na atra tat ā iti prakrāntaḥ tad śabdaḥ parāmṛśyate tad saṃbandha pratītau iti arthaḥ

original: nanu prayogadarśanam evātra samarthakaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkya prayogasya prāmādikapāṭhaviparyāsahetukatvam āha - mīlitam iti /
analyzed: nanu prayoga darśanam eva atra samarthakam bhaviṣyati iti āśaṅkya prayogasya prāmādika pāṭha viparyāsa hetuka tvam āha mīlitam iti
tad abhinna arthaḥ tad śabda abhinna arthaḥ
tasya adaḥ śabdasya
tad śabda abhinna artha tve daśa śabdasya dūṣaṇa dvayam uktam

original: kevalādaśśabdapryoge asau marud ityādau yacchabdākāṅkṣā syād ity ekaṃ yacchabdasahāyasyādaśśabdasya prayoge yo 'sau jagattrayetyādau prayuktatacchabdākāṅkṣā  #
analyzed: kevala adaḥ śabda pryoge asau marut ityādau yad śabda ākāṅkṣā syāt iti ekam yad śabda sahāyasya adaḥ śabdasya prayoge sau jagattraya ityādau prayukta tad śabda ākāṅkṣā
na syāt iti dvitīyam

original: atra yasya prakopetyadaśśabdarahitayacchabdaprayogo dṛṣṭāntatvenokto yathāsya kevalasya tacchabdākāṅkṣā tathādaśśabdayuktasyāpīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: atra yasya prakopa iti adaḥśabda rahita yad śabda prayogaḥ dṛṣṭānta tvena uktaḥ yathā asya kevalasya tad śabda ākāṅkṣā tathā adaḥśabda yuktasya api iti arthaḥ

original: parikalpyata iti tasya yathoktavastv iti yathā avigānena śiṣṭaprasiddhipāraṃparyeṇoktaṃ vastu tacchabdārthavivikto viṣayas tasya tanmate asaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: parikalpyate iti tasya yathā ukta vastu iti yathā avigānena śiṣṭa prasiddhi pāraṃparyeṇa uktam vastu tad śabda artha viviktaḥ viṣayaḥ tasya tad mate asaṃbhavaḥ

original: tvayā hy adaśśabdasya tacchabdārthatvam ucyate tatra yacchabdaparāmarśāpekṣāprasaṅgaḥ ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tvayā hi adaḥ śabdasya tad śabda artha tvam ucyate tatra yad śabda parāmarśa apekṣā prasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ
parikalpyate iti prayoga pravāha prāmāṇya anyathā anupapattyau āyātayā arthāpattyā iti arthaḥ
tam antareṇa iti
tad śabdena prayoga pravāhaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ

original: yadi tu tām iti tadabhinnārthatānupapattiḥ parāmṛṣṭā /
analyzed: yadi tu tām iti tad abhinna artha tā anupapattiḥ parāmṛṣṭā
gate nu gatam yasya sa gatānugatikaḥ
matvarthīyaḥ traḥ ṭhan pratyayaḥ

original: yenaiva pathā eko gacchati tenaivāvicāritenaiva yo gacchati sa ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: yena eva pathā ekaḥ gacchati tena eva avicāritena eva yaḥ gacchati saḥ iti arthaḥ
tatas bhāva pratyayaḥ
avikalpam iti akāra praśleṣaḥ
niśśaṅkam iti arthaḥ
yat vā na vikalpa mātreṇa
api tu sākṣāt iti arthaḥ
smṛti bhūḥ kāmaḥ
dvitīyaḥ smṛti bhū śabdaḥ smaraṇa viṣaye prayuktaḥ
dagdha tvāt smṛti mātra śeṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
kṣatāt vadhāt
vyavahitānām eva iti yathā yaḥ vikalpam ityādau
avyavahita tve vā iti
yathā smṛti bhūḥ ityādau
etad artham eva udāharaṇa dvayam uktam
tatra hi iti idam ādi sahita prayoge
tayoḥ iti yad tadoḥ
tad itarā iti yadṛcchayā ekatara prayoge anyatara apekṣā iti arthaḥ

original: sutarām iti idamādisāhityena prayukto yacchabdaḥ svabhāvato vikāsitāsya eva tacchabdaṃ pratīkṣate,
analyzed: sutarām iti idam ādi sāhityena prayuktaḥ yat śabdaḥ svabhāvataḥ vikāsita āsyaḥ eva tad śabdam pratīkṣate
evam yad śabdam iti jñeyam

original: etac ca krameṇodāhṛtaṃ yad etad iti,
analyzed: etat ca krameṇa udāhṛtam yat etat iti
saḥ yam iti ca

original: tad anyena granthena pradarśaka upayujyate tadvad asya yacchabdasya na prakrāntaparāmarśe saṃbandho,
analyzed: tat anyena granthena pradarśakaḥ upayujyate tadvat asya yad śabdasya na prakrānta parāmarśe
nā api prakraṃsyamāna vastu samanvaya mārga upadeśe tad śabda adhyāhāraḥ śaraṇam

original: sa ca satkāvyakalaṅkāyamāno heya eva anuktvaiveti yattador madhye parāmṛśyam anuktvā
analyzed: sa ca sat kāvyakalaṅkāyamānaḥ heyaḥ eva an uktvā eva iti yat tadoḥ madhye parāmṛśyam an uktvā

original: yatra nirantaraḥ prayogaḥ yathā yat tad ūrjitam ityādau tatra tayor yattador yathāyogaṃ
analyzed: yatra nirantaraḥ prayogaḥ yathā yat tat ūrjitam ityādau tatra tayoḥ yad tadoḥ yathāyogam

original: punaḥ prayogo na duṣyati yatha nūnaṃ tad api hāritam ityādau /
analyzed: punar prayogaḥ na duṣyati nūnam tat api hāritam ityādau
tathā tayoḥ yad tadoḥ

original: nirantaranirdiṣṭeṣv idamādiṣu satsu tayor yattadoḥ teṣām idamādīnāṃ ca saṅghaṭitatvena
analyzed: nirantara nirdiṣṭeṣu idam ādiṣu satsu tayoḥ yad tadoḥ teṣām idam ādīnām ca saṅghaṭita tvena

original: sthitānāṃ yathāyogaṃ yattadoḥ pratyavekṣā na nivarttate yathā aprayukteṣv idamādiṣu
analyzed: sthitānām yathāyogam yad tadoḥ pratyavekṣā na nivarttate yathā a prayukteṣu idam ādiṣu

original: kevalayoḥ pṛthagavasthitayor apekṣā na nivarttate tadvat prayukteṣv apīty arthaḥ
analyzed: kevalayoḥ pṛthak avasthitayoḥ apekṣā na nivarttate tadvat prayukteṣu api iti arthaḥ
yathā yat etat candra antar iti
saḥ yam paṭe iti ca
evam prakṛte sau iti
tad sāṅkarya iti

original: yacchabdasya pṛthag idamādisāhitye tacchabdasya ca pṛthag idamādisāhitye yattadoḥ parasparasāhitye ca bahavo bhedāḥ,
analyzed: yad śabdasya pṛthak idam ādi sāhitye tad śabdasya ca pṛthak idam ādi sāhitye yad tadoḥ paraspara sāhitye ca bahavaḥ bhedāḥ
teṣām udāharaṇeṣu diś mātram darśitam
saṃprati prāyeṇa vākya artha samanvaya vyāpinoḥ yad tadoḥ yaḥ yam nitya abhisaṃbandha tvena upakrama upasaṃhāra kramaḥ
sa prasaṅgāt vicāryate
sa ca puṣṭa apuṣṭa duṣṭa bhedena trividhaḥ
prathamam śābda tva artha tva bhedena dvividhaḥ
śābdaḥ pi yad śabda upakramaḥ tad śabda upakramaḥ ca iti dvividhaḥ

original: ārtho 'pi yacchabdamātrānupādāne tacchabdasyopāttasya prasiddhānubhūtaprakrāntaviṣayeṇa yadābhisaṃbandhāt trividhaḥ /
analyzed: yat śabda mātra anupādāne tad śabdasya upāttasya prasiddha anubhūta prakrānta viṣayeṇa yadā abhisaṃbandhāt trividhaḥ

original: yacchabdasya ca tacchabdānupādāne kevalam upāttasya prakrāntaviṣayeṇa kalpitatatkarmādiviṣayeṇa ca tadābhisaṃbandhād dvividhaḥ /
analyzed: yad śabdasya ca tad śabda anupādāne kevalam upāttasya prakrānta viṣayeṇa kalpita tad karma ādi viṣayeṇa ca tadā abhisaṃbandhāt dvividhaḥ

original: ubhayānupādāne tu dvayor upāttavastuviṣayatākalpana eka eva bhedaḥ /
analyzed: ubhaya anupādāne tu dvayoḥ upātta vastu viṣaya tā kalpane ekaḥ eva bhedaḥ

original: evaṃ śābdo dvividha ārthaḥ ṣaḍbheda ity aṣṭavidho yattador upakramopasaṃhārakramaḥ puṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: evam śābdaḥ dvividhaḥ ārthaḥ ṣaṣ bhedaḥ iti aṣṭavidhaḥ yad tadoḥ upakrama upasaṃhāra kramaḥ puṣṭaḥ
tat ca etat ca iha granthakṛtā udāhṛtam

original: yat tadūrjitam ityādau tu śābdasyārthasya copasaṃhārakramasya saṅkīrṇatvam iti nāsya pṛthagbhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yat tat ūrjitam ityādau tu śābdasya arthasya ca upasaṃhāra kramasya saṅkīrṇa tvam iti na asya pṛthagbhāvaḥ

original: apuṣṭasya duṣṭamadhye prasaṅgena varṇayiṣyamāṇatvād idānīṃ duṣṭo vyākriyate /
analyzed: apuṣṭasya duṣṭa madhye prasaṅgena varṇayiṣyamāṇa tvāt idānīm duṣṭaḥ vyākriyate

original: tatra yattadoḥ sthāne tacchabdayacchabdanairantaryeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyena cedamādīnaṃ duṣṭataiva teṣām atadarthatvāt tannikaṭe ca prayujyamānānāṃ
analyzed: tatra yad tadoḥ sthāne tad śabda yad śabda nairantaryeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyena ca idam ādīnam duṣṭa tā eva teṣām atadartha tvāt tad nikaṭe ca prayujyamānānām
yathā sau kutra camatkṛteḥ iti
evam tad śabda sācivyena idam ādīnām udāharaṇam ūhyam

original: viprakṛṣṭatvena sannikṛṣṭatve 'pi vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā teṣām prayoge na duṣṭaṃ nāduṣṭam ity apuṣṭatvam eva yathā yo 'vikalpam iti smṛtibhūḥ  #
analyzed: viprakṛṣṭa tvena sannikṛṣṭa tve vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā teṣām prayoge na duṣṭam na aduṣṭam iti apuṣṭa tvam eva yathā yaḥ vikalpam iti smṛti bhūḥ
smṛti bhūḥ iti ca
evam tad śabda upakramaḥ udāharttu ayam
tathā tad śabdasya parokṣāyamāṇa artha pratyavamarśi tvāt eka vākya stha pratyakṣāyamāṇa pradhāna bhūta artha pratyavamarśe duṣṭa tvam
yathā sa vaḥ śaśi kalā mauliḥ ityādau
pradhāna grahaṇena na kartṛ mātram nirdiṣṭam

original: api tu kārakāntaram api prādhānyena vivakṣitatvāt pratyakṣāyamāṇam / tena
analyzed: api tu kāraka antaram api prādhānyena vivakṣita tvāt pratyakṣāyamāṇam tena
sa medinīm vinirjitya catur jaladhi mekhalām
saciva arpita tad bhāraḥ tasyām āsta yathāsukham

original: iti medinyās tacchabdaparāmarśo na sundara ity āhuḥ /
analyzed: iti medinyāḥ tad śabda parāmarśaḥ na sundaraḥ iti āhuḥ

original: yathā yattadoḥ padārthavākyārthagatatvena dvividhāvasthāne yad ekasya padārthaniṣṭhatvād
analyzed: yathā yad tadoḥ padārtha vākya artha gata tvena dvividha avasthāne yat ekasya padārtha niṣṭha tvāt

original: anyasya vākyārthaviṣayatvaṃ tad bhinnaviṣayatvena nityābhisaṃbandhaparipanthi duṣṭam eva / yathā
analyzed: anyasya vākya artha viṣaya tvam tat bhinna viṣaya tvena nitya abhisaṃbandha paripanthi duṣṭam eva yathā

original: hemrāṃ bhāraśatāni vā madamucāṃ bṛndāni vā dantināṃ śrīharṣeṇa yad arpitāni guṇine bāṇāya kutrādya tat /
analyzed: hemrām bhāra śatāni vā mada mucām bṛndāni vā dantinām śrī harṣeṇa yat arpitāni guṇine bāṇāya kutra adya tat

original: yā bāṇena tu tasya sūktivisarair uṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrttayas tat kalpapralaye 'pi yānti na manāṅ manye parimlānatām //
analyzed: yāḥ bāṇena tu tasya su ukti visaraiḥ uṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrttayaḥ tat kalpa pralaye yānti na manāk manye parimlāna tām

original: iti / yā iti padārthaviṣayatvam anipātasya tacchabdasya /
analyzed: iti yā iti padārtha viṣaya tvam anipātasya tad śabdasya
tat iti tu vākya artha viṣayaḥ tad śabdaḥ
padārtha viṣaye tāḥ iti syāt

original: atraiva yad bāṇena tu tasyeti tāḥ kalpapralaye 'pi iti ca pāṭhe yado vākyārthaviṣayatve tadaḥ padārthaniṣṭhatva udāharaṇaṃ deyam /
analyzed: atra eva yat bāṇena tu tasya iti tāḥ kalpa pralaye iti ca pāṭhe yadaḥ vākya artha viṣaya tve tadaḥ padārtha niṣṭha tve udāharaṇam deyam

original: tasmād yā bāṇena tv iti tāḥ kalpapralaye 'pīti ca paṭhanīyam / iha tu
analyzed: tasmāt yāḥ bāṇena tu iti tāḥ kalpa pralaye ca paṭhanīyam iha tu

original: indīvaraṃ yadatasīkusumasya vṛttyā yat ketakaṃ jaraḍhabhūrjadalānuvṛttyā /
analyzed: indīvaram yat atasī kusumasya vṛttyā yat ketakam jaraḍha bhūrja dala anuvṛttyā

original: yan manyase ca vakulaṃ karavīravṛttyā sā sāmprataṃ madhupa hanta tavaiva hāniḥ //
analyzed: yat manyase ca vakulam karavīra vṛttyā sā sāmpratam madhupa hanta tava eva hāniḥ
iti na kevalam yad śabdaḥ vākya artha viṣaye
yāvat tad śabdaḥ pi

original: yadi paraṃ sa vākyārtho hānipadena piṇḍīkṛtya prakāśitas tacchabdena parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: yadi param sa vākya arthaḥ hāni padena piṇḍīkṛtya prakāśitaḥ tad śabdena parāmṛṣṭaḥ
atas eva atra tad śabdasya vidheya padārtha abhiprāyeṇa strī liṅga tvam
anuvādya abhiprāyeṇa tu tat sāmpratam iti
ubhayathā api liṅga parigrahaḥ śiṣṭa pravāhe sthitaḥ

original: kiṃ ca yattador nityābhisaṃbandhād guṇapradhānayoś ca saṃbandhārhatvāt parāmṛśya ekatra yacchabdavākye tacchabdavākye vā nirdiṣṭa itaravākye  #
analyzed: kim ca yad tadoḥ nitya abhisaṃbandhāt guṇa pradhānayoḥ ca saṃbandha arha tvāt parāmṛśyaḥ ekatra yad śabda vākye tad śabda vākye vā nirdiṣṭaḥ itara vākye
tadā yadā vā pratyavamṛśyate

original: yacchabdavākye tu nirdiṣṭena yacchabdāntareṇa guṇānāṃ pradhānānāṃ ca parasparam abhisaṃbandhāt /
analyzed: yad śabda vākye tu nirdiṣṭena yad śabda antareṇa guṇānām pradhānānām ca parasparam abhisaṃbandhāt

original: evaṃ ca tathā parāmarśe dvau duṣṭābhedau / yathā:
analyzed: evam ca tathā parāmarśe dvau duṣṭa abhedau yathā

original: yeṣāṃ tās tridaśebhadānasaritaḥ pītāḥ pratāpoṣmabhir līlāpānabhuvaś ca nandanatarucchāyāsu yaiḥ kalpitāḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām tāḥ tridaśa ibha dāna saritaḥ pītāḥ pratāpa ūṣmabhiḥ līlā pāna bhuvaḥ ca nandana taru chāyāsu yaiḥ kalpitāḥ

original: yeṣāṃ huṅkṛtayaḥ kṛtāmarapurakṣobhāḥ kṣapācāriṇāṃ kiṃ tais tvatparitoṣakāri vihitaṃ kiṃ cit pravādocitam //

original: atra ca yasmād eṣā dhanur upaniṣad iti paṭhanīyam /

original: evaṃ ca prāg ukte hemno bhārataśatānītyādau tā bāṇena tu tasya sūktivisarair uṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrtayo yāḥ kalpapralaye 'pi yānti na manāṅ manye parimlānatām  #

original: pūrvavākyārthe parāmṛśyam aspṛśantī upaplavamānā pratītir iti vākyārthapratipattiviprakarṣād apuṣṭatvam / yathā:
analyzed: pūrva vākya arthe parāmṛśyam a spṛśantī upaplavamānā pratītiḥ iti vākya artha pratipatti viprakarṣāt apuṣṭa tvam yathā

original: svasthād evāvamānena dehinas tad varaṃ rajaḥ //

original: atrādrāv iti nirdiśyamānam adrimātrapratīter na prakṛtam adriṃ gamayet /

original: candrasya tv ekatvāt tadakaraṇam iti ke cit /

original: candrasya punar ekavyaktirūpasya kālabhedād avasthābhedāc ca bhinnatvam amukhyam iti cen na /

original: ataś caiva dvitīyācandrādivyāvṛttyā pūrṇacandrapratītyarthaṃ mukhacchāyānukārīti viśeṣaṇaṃ dattam /

original: kva cij jātivyavahāreṣv apīndīvarādīnām ekatvaṃ siddham /

original: bibhartti yaḥ iti kukṣiṃbhariś ca iti nipātitasya kukṣimbhariśabdasyāyaṃ gocaraḥ /
analyzed: bibhartti yaḥ iti kukṣiṃbhariḥ ca iti nipātitasya kukṣimbhari śabdasya ayam gocaraḥ

original: vidhun tud iti vidhvaruṣos tud iti khaśpratyayasthānam /
analyzed: vidhun tud iti vidhu aruṣoḥ tud iti khaś pratyaya sthānam

original: śīrṣacchedam iti śīrṣacchedād yac ca iti taddhitasya yat pratyayasyedaṃ padam /
analyzed: śīrṣa chedam iti śīrṣa chedāt yat ca iti taddhitasya yat pratyayasya idam padam

sarva arthasya iti

original: vidhoś ceti vyakta sthitaḥ utkarṣam ādadhatāṃ prādhānyena vivakṣety atra sāmastyena yojanīyam /
analyzed: vidhoḥ ca iti vyakta sthitaḥ utkarṣam ādadhatām prādhānyena vivakṣā iti atra sāmastyena yojanīyam

analyzed: śīrṣacchedasya ca iti utkarṣam ādadhataḥ prādhānyena vivakṣā iti saṃbandhanīyam

original: atra ca sarvārthādīnāṃ caturṇām utkarṣādhāne samanantaranirdiṣṭa bhuvanābhayetyādicatuṣṭayaṃ krameṇa hetutvena draṣṭavyam /

tat api iti caritam

original: daśarathasya hi prasūtir asāv iti tasyāpatyam iti stracpratyaye taddhite kṛte dāśarathiśabdasyāyaṃ gocaraḥ /
analyzed: daśarathasya hi prasūtiḥ asau iti tasya apatyam iti strac pratyaye taddhite kṛte dāśarathi śabdasya ayam gocaraḥ

original: vākye tu yady apīti tad uktam - kriyāpradhānaṃ guṇavad ekārthaṃ vākyam iṣyate iti /
analyzed: vākye tu yadi api iti tat uktam kriyā pradhānam guṇavat eka artham vākyam iṣyate iti
anye iti vakṣyamāna nyāyena śabda kṛta sāmarthya uktiḥ

original: sa iti pradhānabhāvenety atra nirdiṣṭaḥ pradhānabhāvaḥ śabdārthasāmarthyavivakṣākṛtānāṃ trayāṇām apīti śabdakṛtaṃ śabdasaṃskāramahimnā niṣpannaṃ  #
analyzed: saḥ iti pradhāna bhāvena iti atra nirdiṣṭaḥ pradhāna bhāvaḥ śabda artha sāmarthya vivakṣā kṛtānām trayāṇām api iti śabda kṛtam śabda saṃskāra mahimnā niṣpannam
yathā karmadhārayāt uttara padasya

original: arthasāmarthyakṛtaṃ vastuvṛttaniṣpāditaṃ yathā grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭītyādau grahādeḥ /
analyzed: artha sāmarthya kṛtam vastu vṛtta niṣpāditam yathā graham saṃmārṣṭi ityādau graha ādeḥ

original: vivakṣākṛtaṃ prayoktṛyadṛcchāpratipāditaṃ yad anyasyotkarṣāpakarṣādhānatayā vivakṣitaṃ yathā rāmasya pāṇir asi ityādau rāmādeḥ /
analyzed: vivakṣā kṛtam prayoktṛ yadṛcchā pratipāditam yat anyasya utkarṣa apakarṣa ādhāna tayā vivakṣitam yathā rāmasya pāṇiḥ asi ityādau rāma ādeḥ

original: tatra triṣu prādhānyeṣu vivakṣākṛtam eva grādhānyaṃ pradhānam /
analyzed: tatra triṣu prādhānyeṣu vivakṣā kṛtam eva grādhānyam pradhānam
tad kṛta tvāt kāvya artha camatkārasya
atas eva uktam tayoḥ sama śīrṣika abhāvāt iti

original: tayor iti śabdārthasāmarthyakṛtayoḥ vivakṣākṛtena sahety arthāt /
analyzed: tayoḥ iti śabda artha sāmarthya kṛtayoḥ vivakṣā kṛtena saha iti arthāt

original: nanu pūrvaṃ śābdasyaiva prādhānyasya vaivakṣikatvam uktam anyasya tu vāstavatvam /
analyzed: nanu pūrvam śābdasya eva prādhānyasya vaivakṣika tvam uktam anyasya tu vāstava tvam

original: tat katham iha śābdavaivakṣikayor anyatvam ucyate /

anya tve vā prādhānya traya pratipādane kaḥ viśeṣaḥ

na eṣa doṣaḥ
pūrvam hi śābdika eka gocarasya śābdika vivakṣā kṛta tvāt vaivakṣika tvam

original: anyasya tu kavigocarasya vāstavatvaṃ tad evārthatvam /
analyzed: anyasya tu kavi gocarasya vāstava tvam tat eva artha tvam

original: iha punaḥ sahṛdayaikagocarasya kavivivakṣāvaśād vaivakṣikatvam ucyate /
analyzed: iha punar sahṛdaya eka gocarasya kavi vivakṣā vaśāt vaivakṣika tvam ucyate

original: śābdikaikaviṣayasya śābdatvam ity apekṣābhedāt pūrvas tāvan na virodhaḥ /
analyzed: śābdika eka viṣayasya śābda tvam iti apekṣā bhedāt pūrvaḥ tāvat na virodhaḥ

original: yad api prādhānyatrayapratipādane 'rthasāmarthyavivakṣākṛtayor bheda uktas tatrāyaṃ bhāvaḥ - iha śābdaṃ vāstavaṃ ceti dvividham eva prādhānyam
analyzed: yat api prādhānya traya pratipādane rtha sāmarthya vivakṣā kṛtayoḥ bhedaḥ uktaḥ tatra ayam bhāvaḥ iha śābdam vāstavam ca iti dvividham eva prādhānyam

original: saty api śabdakṛtād anyatva utkarṣāpakarṣapratipādanaprayuktakavivivakṣākṛtatve vāstavam eva vivakṣākṛta pratipāditam /

original: tathā ca grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭīti vaidikaṃ vivakṣānapekṣam arthasāmarthyakṛtasyodāharaṇaṃ dattam iti viṣayavibhāgavyavasthiter na dvitīyo 'pi virodha  #

iti samañjasam sarvam

original: evaṃ kṛttaddhitavṛttiviṣaye ātideśikaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ vicārya samāsagatatvenaupadeśikaṃ prakṛtam anusandhatte tad idam atreti /

original: sarūpāṇām iti dvandvasamāsasamānanyāyatvād ekaśeṣavṛttir api svīkṛtā /

original: anabhidhānaṃ veti abhidhānalakṣaṇā hi kṛttaddhitasmāsā iti /
analyzed: anabhidhānam vā iti abhidhāna lakṣaṇāḥ hi iti
samartha grahaṇam ca vā iti
caśabdaḥ tra atiriktaḥ
samuccaya vikalpayoḥ virodhāt evam ca

original: dṛṣṭir nāmṛtavarṣiṇī smitamadhuprasyandi vaktraṃ na tan nārdrārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni cāṅgāni vā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ na amṛta varṣiṇī smita madhu prasyandi vaktram na tat na ārdra ārdram hṛdayam na candana rasa sparśāni ca aṅgāni vā
iti atra ca vā śabda dvayam pratyuktam
ca vā śabda arthayoḥ ekatra virodhāt

original: khaṇḍiketi khaṇḍo granthasaṃbandhī na tu samasto granthaḥ /
analyzed: khaṇḍikā iti khaṇḍaḥ grantha saṃbandhī na tu samastaḥ granthaḥ
sa vidyate yeṣām

original: anavagatatadabhiprāyair iti samarthagrahaṇaṃ praty ācāryasya hi tair abhiprāyo nāgataḥ /
analyzed: an avagata tad abhiprāyaiḥ iti samartha grahaṇam prati ācāryasya hi taiḥ abhiprāyaḥ na āgataḥ
abhidhāna ādhāna uddhāra iti
abhidhānānām śabdānām ādhānam abhinavānām nyasanam
uddhāraḥ pūrvakāṇām uddharaṇam
śālīnāḥ adhṛṣṭāḥ avicārakāḥ iti arthaḥ
aparam api iti punarukta ādikam
tad cintā iti
prādhānya itara bhāvena samāsa asamāsa cintā
prakaraṇa iti

original: yatrārthaprakaraṇādinā śabdasya vācyo 'rthaḥ prakarṣāpakarṣādikam arthāntaraṃ prakāśayati,
analyzed: yatra artha prakaraṇa ādinā śabdasya vācyaḥ rthaḥ prakarṣa apakarṣa ādikam artha antaram prakāśayati
tatra abhipreta artha vināśa bhayāt samāsaḥ na karttavyaḥ
yathā rāmasya pāṇiḥ asi iti

original: prakaraṇaśabdādisakha iti pāṭhe śabdasyānyasya sannidhir iti svīkṛtam /
analyzed: prakaraṇa śabda ādi sakhaḥ iti pāṭhe śabdasya anyasya sannidhiḥ iti svīkṛtam
yadā prakaraṇa kāku ādi sakhaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ

original: tadā kākugrahaṇena svaraviśeṣa ucyate yaḥ kālo vyaktisvarādayaḥ iti kāvyagatatvena svīkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tadā kāku grahaṇena svara viśeṣaḥ ucyate yaḥ kālaḥ vyakti svara ādayaḥ iti kāvya gata tvena svīkṛtaḥ
evam prasakta anuprasaktikayā samāsa gata tvena tad atideśena samagra pravṛtti gata tvena api

original: guṇapradhānabhāvavivakṣāṃ mahatā prapañcena parighaṭayya prakṛtodāraṇe ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣagatatvena
analyzed: guṇa pradhāna bhāva vivakṣām mahatā prapañcena parighaṭayya prakṛta udāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣa gata tvena
yojayitum āha ittham avasthitaḥ iti
ambikāyāḥ upādānam iti saṃbandhaḥ
tat kim iti
viśeṣaṇasya anya kesari vyāvṛttiḥ vā
kesari gata prakarṣa pratipādanam vā phalam
ādye pakṣe nirdiṣṭa camatkāra sambhāvanā
vivakṣita padam camatkāra atiśaya padena yojanīyam
tasyāḥ iti ambikāyāḥ sakāśāt
tayā avacchinnaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ
viśiṣṭaḥ eva iti loka uttaraḥ
mohantu iti hareḥ vihaṅgamaḥ garuḍaḥ
moham ajñānam hantu iti arthaḥ
garuḍa jāti avacchinnaḥ iti
saugata dṛśā garuḍānām bahu tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
vihaṅgama viśeṣa tvam tu jāti ādi vailakṣaṇyāt
sva abhiprāya āviṣkaraṇam iti
sādṛśya mūlayā aprastuta praśaṃsayā iti bhāvaḥ
tasyāḥ ca iti tad śabdena sarasvatī parāmṛṣṭā

original: sarasvatyā ambikā pratibimbam ātmanaś ca kesarīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: sarasvatyāḥ ambikā pratibimbam ātmanaḥ ca kesarī iti arthaḥ
dvitīya pakṣe iti
kesari gata prakarṣa pratipādana pakṣe

original: samāsād asāv iti ambikākesariśabdād unmiṣaty eva sa camatkāra ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: samāsāt asau iti ambikā kesari śabdāt unmiṣati eva sa camatkāraḥ iti arthaḥ
udaya astamaya iti

original: vṛttau camatkārasyāstamaya vākye udaya iti cūlikākrameṇa yogaḥ /
analyzed: vṛttau camatkārasya astamaya vākye udayaḥ iti cūlikā krameṇa yogaḥ
upadarśitam eva prāk iti udāharaṇa pratyudāharaṇa pradarśana dvāreṇa
iṣṭam hi iti abhipretasya aprāptiḥ yā

original: sā codanārhā iṣṭam etan na sidhyatīti /
analyzed: sā codanā arhā iṣṭam etat na sidhyati iti
yat tu na abhipretam tasya aprāptiḥ bhūṣaṇam
na tu dūṣaṇam iti arthaḥ
asmābhiḥ asau iti asau camatkāraḥ

original: sā bhrāntir eveti nirvikalpavikalpabhedena dvividhā bhrāntiḥ /
analyzed: sā bhrāntiḥ eva iti nirvikalpa vikalpa bhedena dvividhā bhrāntiḥ
tatra ādyā timira ādi upapluta indriyasya dvi candra ādi pratīti rūpā
sā iti camatkāra avagatiḥ
vyākhyā vākyāt eva iti ambikāyāḥ kesarī iti samāsa vivaraṇa vākyāt
teṣām iti pratīti vaicitrya anabhyupagama vādinām

original: tatrāropiteti tatra samāse śuktisthānīye rajatam ivāropitāvāstavīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: tatra āropitā iti tatra samāse śukti sthānīye rajatam iva āropita avāstavī iti arthaḥ
udaya astamaya pakṣau kramāt vākya samāsa gatau
udyogaḥ iti
saṃrambha padam nirasya udyoga pada karaṇam prakramyamāna udyukta vat padakrama abhedāya

original: yo 'sāv ity adaḥśabdaḥ prasiddhiparāmarśakaḥ yacchabdapratinirdeśasya tacchabdena kariṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: sau iti adaḥ śabdaḥ prasiddhi parāmarśakaḥ yad śabda pratinirdeśasya tad śabdena kariṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: ārtho hi kevalatacchabdasya prayoganibandhana upakramopasaṃhārakramaḥ pratipādita eva /
analyzed: ārthaḥ hi kevala tad śabdasya prayoga nibandhanaḥ upakrama upasaṃhāra kramaḥ pratipāditaḥ eva
rajaḥ chalena iti
chala iva śabda prayoge sa apahnavā iyam utprekṣā
kevala chala śabda prayoge pi apahnutiḥ
kevala iva śabda prayoge ca sambhāvanā pratītau utprekṣā
dvaya prayoge tu śabalā pratītiḥ
na ca atra apahnuti utprekṣayoḥ saṅkaraḥ
utprekṣā hi apahnutya vinābhāvinī

original: so 'pahnavaḥ kva cid garbhīkṛto yathā nakhakṣatānīva vanasthalīnām ity atra,
analyzed: saḥ u pahnavaḥ kva cit garbhīkṛtaḥ yathā nakha kṣatāni iva vana sthalīnām iti atra
na palāśāni
kin tu sambhāvayāmi nakha kṣatāni iti pratīteḥ

original: kva cit tu śabdena pratipādyate yathā adhyāruroheveti /
analyzed: kva cit tu śabdena pratipādyate yathā adhyāruroha iva iti
evam ca asyāḥ apahnuti avinābhāvinyāḥ apahnuti bādhaka tvam
na tayā saha saṅkaraḥ
bhinna vākyatāyām eva iti

original: tatra hi vidhyanuvādabhāva āñjasyena krameṇa pratīyate /
analyzed: tatra hi vidhi anuvāda bhāvaḥ āñjasyena krameṇa pratīyate
tat eva vā iti viśeṣaṇam
tat ca vidhi anuvāda bhāva vivakṣāyām vidheyam
anyatra iti
utkarṣa aparṣayoḥ vidheya tvasya ca abhāve
kāmacāraḥ iti samāsa asamāsayoḥ
tad artham iti utkarṣa ādi viṣaye samāsa niṣedha artham
sāpekṣā iti sa apekṣam asamartham bhavati iti etāvat mātra pratītaye

original: pitroḥ svateveti yathā pitarau vandanīyāv iti nityasaṃbandhanyāyād nijāv eva pitarau pratīyete,
analyzed: pitroḥ svatā iva iti yathā pitarau vandanīyau iti nitya saṃbandha nyāyāt nijau eva pitarau pratīyete

original: tadvat sāpekṣāṇām anabhidhānākhyena nyāyena samāsābhāvaḥ pratyeṣyate /
analyzed: tadvat sāpekṣāṇām anabhidhāna ākhyena nyāyena samāsa abhāvaḥ pratyeṣyate
svatā ātmīya tvam iva

original: adhunā svotkarṣaśālitāprakaṭanārthaṃ svapariśramaṃ piṇḍīkṛtya ślokena darśayitum āha kāvyakāñcaneti /
analyzed: adhunā sva utkarṣa śāli tā prakaṭana artham sva pariśramam piṇḍīkṛtya ślokena darśayitum āha kāvya kāñcana iti

original: kāvyam eva parīkṣaṇīyatvāt suvarṇaṃ tatra parīkṣāsthānaṃ nikaṣopalam ātmānaṃ manyate,
analyzed: kāvyam eva parīkṣaṇīya tvāt suvarṇam tatra parīkṣā sthānam nikaṣa upalam ātmānam manyate

original: na punar uktakrameṇa parāmarthas san nikaṣopalaḥ /

atas eva kuntakena iti khyātasya api ulluṇṭhana vacanam

original: yaḥ sarvasāratayā pradarśitas tatreyatī dūṣaṇavṛṣṭir muktā /

original: atra śloke vakṣyamāṇaitadīyanyāyānusāreṇa kaṣeṇa niyamena kāñcanākṣepāt kāñcanapadaṃ paunaruktyadoṣaduṣṭam /

original: nijakāvyalakṣmaṇīty atra nijārthasya saṃrambhāspadatvena vidheyatvāt samāsakaraṇaṃ vidheyāvimarśadūṣitaṃ ke cid ācakṣate vicakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: nija kāvya lakṣmaṇi iti atra nija arthasya saṃrambha āspada tvena vidheya tvāt samāsa karaṇam vidheya avimarśa dūṣitam ke cid ācakṣate vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: tattvenaiva granthakṛtā svakṛtiṣv ayantrita ityādinā dattottaram eva /
analyzed: tattvena eva granthakṛtā sva kṛtiṣu a yantritaḥ ityādinā datta uttaram eva
asya ca vidheya avimarśasya ananta itara prasiddha lakṣya pāti tvena asmābhiḥ nāṭakamīmāṃsāyām

original: sāhityamīmāṃsāyāṃ ca teṣu teṣu sthāneṣu prapañcaḥ pradarśita iti granthavistarabhayād ita evoparamyate /
analyzed: sāhitya mīmāṃsāyām ca teṣu teṣu sthāneṣu prapañcaḥ pradarśitaḥ iti grantha vistara bhayāt itas evā uparamyate

original: evaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ prakāravaicitryeṇa lakṣayitvā prakramabhedaṃ lakṣayitum āha - prakramabhedo 'pīti /

pratipattṛ pratīteḥ iti ratha sthānīyā pratipattṛ pratītiḥ

tad viṣaya bhāvaḥ prakrama bheda viṣaya tvam

analam asamarthā

nirvāhakam ca vidheya prakhyam

original: tadā jāyante guṇā yadā tais sahṛdayair gṛhyante /
analyzed: tadā jāyante guṇāḥ yadā taiḥ sahṛdayaiḥ gṛhyante

original: evam eva janas tasyā dadāti kapolopamāyāṃ śaśibimbam /

original: paramārthavicāre punaś candraś candra iva varākaḥ //
analyzed: parama artha vicāre punar candraḥ candraḥ iva varākaḥ
utkarṣa apakarṣa mātrā iti kamalānām utkarṣa vivakṣā

atas eva udāharaṇa dvayam dattam
prakrama bheda prakāraḥ iti viśeṣaḥ
paryāya prakrama iti

original: candraśabdārthasya śaśiśabdena paryāyāntaranirdeśo na yukto vakṣyamāṇaprakramabhedaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: candra śabda arthasya śaśi śabdena paryāya antara nirdeśaḥ na yuktaḥ vakṣyamāṇa prakrama bheda prasaṅgāt

original: na caivam iti tenaiva śabdenopasaṃhāra ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca evam iti tena eva śabdena upasaṃhāraḥ iti arthaḥ
tayoḥ iti prakrama bheda punaruktayoḥ
asya iti prakrama abhedasya parāmarśaḥ

original: tatra hi yathoddeśaṃ pratinirdeśe na paunaruktyam,
analyzed: tatra hi yathoddeśam pratinirdeśe na paunaruktyam
aikarasyena pratīti prasaraṇāt
uddeśya pratinirdeśya bhāvaḥ na paunaruktyasya viṣayaḥ yathā

original: kṣāmāṅgyaḥ kṣatakomalāṅguligaladraktaiḥ sadarbhāḥ sthalīḥ pādaiḥ pātitayāvakair iva galadbāṣpāmbudhautānanāḥ /
analyzed: kṣāma aṅgyaḥ kṣata komala aṅguli galat raktaiḥ sa darbhāḥ sthalīḥ pādaiḥ pātita yāvakaiḥ iva galat bāṣpa ambu dhauta ānanāḥ

original: iti / atra galacchabdadvayaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ yathoddeśaṃ pratinirdeśo 'sya viṣaya iti samañjasam /
analyzed: iti atra galat śabda dvayam nirdiṣṭam yathoddeśam sya viṣayaḥ iti samañjasam
tayoḥ iti prakrama abheda paunaruktyayoḥ
asya iti prakrama abhedasya parāmarśaḥ
nanu vrajataḥ kva tāta

original: vajasīty atra vrajinā prakrame vajinā ca nirvāhe kathaṃ na prakramabhedaḥ /
analyzed: vajasi iti atra vrajinā prakrame vajinā ca nirvāhe katham na prakrama bhedaḥ
vajatiḥ api dhātuḥ asti

original: vaja vraja gatāv iti pāṭhād ity āśaṅkyoktaṃ vrajata iti /
analyzed: vaja vraja gatau iti pāṭhāt iti āśaṅkya uktam vrajate iti

original: uditaṃ śiśuneti uditam ity asya viśeṣaṇaṃ paricayagatārtham iti /
analyzed: uditam śiśunā iti uditam iti asya viśeṣaṇam paricaya gata artham iti
asphuṭam iti ca
bhāve ca atra pratyayaḥ

original: kāryārthaṃ pathi gacchataḥ paścān nāmodīraṇaṃ viruddham iti śiśunā lalitavacasā nāmany udīrite jananyāsya bhartsanaṃ kṛtam iti tato 'sya manyur  #
analyzed: kārya artham pathi gacchataḥ paścāt nāma udīraṇam viruddham iti śiśunā lalita vacasā nāmani udīrite jananyā asya bhartsanam kṛtam iti manyuḥ
vivṛddhaḥ iti atra tātparyārthaḥ

original: evaṃ dhāturūpāyāḥ prkṛte prakramabhedaṃ pradarśya saṃprati prātipadikarūpāyās tasyā madhye ca sarvanāmādīnāṃ prakāravaicitryeṇa taṃ darśayati  #
analyzed: evam dhātu rūpāyāḥ prkṛte prakrama bhedam pradarśya saṃprati prātipadika rūpāyāḥ tasyāḥ madhye ca sarvanāma ādīnām prakāra vaicitryeṇa tam darśayati
sarvanāmā iti

original: kva cit punaḥ pustakeṣu prakṛtiprakramabhedād anantaraṃ pratyayaprakramabhedodāharaṇaṃ tat paścāt sarvanāmaprakramabhedanirdeśo dṛśyate /
analyzed: kva cit punar pustakeṣu prakṛti prakrama bhedāt anantaram pratyaya prakrama bheda udāharaṇam tat paścāt sarvanāma prakrama bheda nirdeśaḥ dṛśyate

original: tatra ca prkṛter anantaraṃ pratyayasyaiva nirdeśa ucita iti sa eva kathita iti saṅgatiḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca prkṛteḥ anantaram pratyayasya eva nirdeśaḥ ucitaḥ iti saḥ eva kathitaḥ iti saṅgatiḥ

original: tataḥ paraṃ prakṛtiviśeṣāṇāṃ pratyayaviśeṣāṇāṃ tatsamudāyānāṃ ca tatprakramabhedo nirūpayiṣyate /
analyzed: tatas param prakṛti viśeṣāṇām pratyaya viśeṣāṇām tad samudāyānām ca tad prakrama bhedaḥ nirūpayiṣyate
ukta rītyā iti

original: yas tv ekavākye kartṛtvenokto yaś cedamādibhir ity atroktena krameṇety arthaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu eka vākye kartṛ tvena uktaḥ yaḥ ca idam ādibhiḥ iti atra uktena krameṇa iti arthaḥ

original: nanu yacchabdena prakrame tacchabdenedamādibhir vā prakrame yacchabdena vā katham upasaṃhāra ity āha na caivam iti /
analyzed: nanu yad śabdena prakrame tad śabdena idam ādibhiḥ vā prakrame yad śabdena vā katham upasaṃhāraḥ iti āha na ca evam iti
anyonya apekṣe iti
yad tadoḥ nitya abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti uktam

original: evaṃ tacchabdādūraviprakṛṣṭārtheṣv idamādiṣu prāg ukte yo 'vikalpam ityādau jñeyam /
analyzed: evam tad śabda adūra viprakṛṣṭa artheṣu idam ādiṣu prāk ukte yaḥ vikalpam ityādau jñeyam
tena iti prakṛta upasaṃhāraḥ
idam ādīnām paraspara avāntara vaicitrye pi sthūla dṛṣṭyāḥ ekārtha tvam

original: atra hīti atra hi kartṛviśeṣaṇadvāreṇaikasya hetutvam aparasya sākṣād iti prakramabhedaḥ /
analyzed: atra hi iti atra hi kartṛ viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa ekasya hetu tvam aparasya sākṣāt iti prakrama bhedaḥ

original: yaśodhigantum iti atra hi tṛtīyātumunoḥ pratītivaiṣamyajanakatvam /
analyzed: yaśaḥ adhigantum iti atra hi tṛtīyā tumunoḥ pratīti vaiṣamya janaka tvam
vā śabdasya iti

original: vakṣyati hi tulyakakṣyatayā yatra padārthāḥ iti /
analyzed: vakṣyati hi tulya kakṣya tayā yatra padārthāḥ iti
apatyavataḥ pi iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ iti

original: atra ke cit samarthayante - viśeṣataḥ snihyanto dṛśyante tat putraśabdasyāpatyaviśeṣavācitve
analyzed: atra ke cid samarthayante viśeṣataḥ snihyantaḥ dṛśyante tat putra śabdasya apatya viśeṣa vāci tve

original: apatyaśabdasya ca sāmānyavācitve 'pi sarvanāmavaśād viśeṣaparyavasāne bhavaty eva
analyzed: apatya śabdasya ca sāmānya vāci tve sarvanāma vaśāt viśeṣa paryavasāne bhavati eva
prakṛta artha paripoṣaḥ iti

original: tad etad asya granthakārasya hṛdayam anālokyaiva,
analyzed: tat etat asya granthakārasya hṛdayam an ālokya eva

original: pāryavasānikena smareṇaiva saṃmukhīkriyamāṇena vākyārthaḥ parisamapanīya iti pāṭhakramāpekṣayā

original: cūlikākrama eva sahṛdayahṛdayarañjaka iti kuśāgrīyadhiṣaṇair nipuṇaṃ nirūpaṇīyam etat /
analyzed: cūlikā kramaḥ eva sahṛdaya hṛdaya rañjakaḥ iti kuśāgrīya dhiṣaṇaiḥ nipuṇam nirūpaṇīyam etat

original: tathā ca yuṣmadasmadoḥ padasya padāt ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayor vānnāvau iti cūlikākrameṇa vyavahāro dṛśyate /
analyzed: tathā ca yuṣmad asmadoḥ padasya padāt ṣaṣṭhī caturthī dvitīyā sthayoḥ iti cūlikā krameṇa vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate
krama prakrama bhedasya punar udāharaṇam vastu prakrama bheda vicāra prastāve nirūpayiṣyate

original: pradhānabhūtasyety arthapratipādanāya śabdaprayogāc chabdasyopāyamātratvād upāyānāṃ ca niyamābhāvāt / tad uktaṃ -
analyzed: pradhāna bhūtasya iti artha pratipādanāya śabda prayogāt śabdasya upāya mātra tvāt upāyānām ca niyama abhāvāt tat uktam

original: upādāyāpi ye heyās tān upāyān pracakṣate /
analyzed: upādāya api ye heyāḥ tān upāyān pracakṣate
upāyānām ca niyamaḥ na avaśyam avakalpate
iti prakrama bhedaḥ iti

original: prakramabhedaviṣayasya vidhyanuvādabhāvaprakāratvāt prakramabhedo 'py upacārād vidhyanuvādaprakāra ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: prakrama bheda viṣayasya vidhi anuvāda bhāva prakāra tvāt prakrama bhedaḥ u pi upacārāt vidhi anuvāda prakāraḥ iti arthaḥ

original: anenaiva nyāyena śābdaś cārthaś ceti prakramabhedasya bhedadvayaṃ śābdārthaviṣayatvād boddhavyam /
analyzed: anena eva nyāyena śābdaḥ ca arthaḥ ca iti prakrama bhedasya bheda dvayam śābda artha viṣaya tvāt boddhavyam
śabda bhedam iti
eka śabda abheda tva abhidheya tvena arthasya pratyabhijñāyamāna tva upapattaye

original: śabdabhede tasyaivārthasyānyasyeva pratīteḥ nāñjasena prakāreṇa vidhyanuvādabhāvaviṣayatvam /
analyzed: śabda bhede tasya eva arthasya anyasya iva pratīteḥ na añjasena prakāreṇa vidhi anuvāda bhāva viṣaya tvam
kāvya gata tvena hi cintā prastutā

original: na ca kāvye śāstrādivad arthapratītyarthaṃ śabdamātraṃ prayujyate,
analyzed: na ca kāvye śāstra ādi vat artha pratīti artham śabda mātram prayujyate
sahitayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ tatra prayogāt
sāhityam tulya kakṣya tvena anyūna anatirikta tvam

original: astv evam iti sāmānyena prakramabhedābhyupagamo viśeṣe tu paryanuyoga iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: astu evam iti sāmānyena prakrama bheda abhyupagamaḥ viśeṣe tu paryanuyogaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
prakrama bheda niyamam prati iti hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ

original: yadbhedābhedābhyām iti hi yacchabdena prakramaḥ parāmṛśyate /
analyzed: yad bheda abhedābhyām iti hi yad śabdena prakramaḥ parāmṛśyate

original: prakramabhedaniyamaṃ pratīti tu pāṭhe yadbhedābhedābhyām iti prakramasyaivoddhṛtasya yathākathaṃ cit parāmarśo vyākhyeyaḥ /
analyzed: prakrama bheda niyamam prati iti tu pāṭhe yad bheda abhedābhyām iti prakramasya eva uddhṛtasya yathā katham cit parāmarśaḥ vyākhyeyaḥ
śuci bhūṣayati iti

original: atra bhūṣayatīti śābdaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ prakrāntam alaṅkriyetyādāv ārthena rūpeṇa pratinirdiṣṭam /
analyzed: atra bhūṣayati iti śābdam bhūṣaṇam prakrāntam alaṅkriyā ityādau ārthena rūpeṇa pratinirdiṣṭam

original: atra ca paryāyaprakramabhedaḥ sthito 'pi sāṃprataṃ na cintitaḥ śabdārthaprakramabhedacintanaprastāvāt /
analyzed: atra ca paryāya prakrama bhedaḥ sāṃpratam na cintitaḥ śabda artha prakrama bheda cintana prastāvāt
atra vibhāgasya eva iti

original: atra vety arthād upameyam tadabhisaṃbandhaḥ śabdābhisaṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: atra vā iti arthāt upameyam tad abhisaṃbandhaḥ śabda abhisaṃbandhaḥ
viparyayāt iti sākṣāt śabda saṃbandha abhāvāt

original: udāharaṇadvaye śuci bhūṣayati iti cārutā vapur iti ca /
analyzed: udāharaṇa dvaye śuci bhūṣayati iti cāru tā vapuḥ iti ca

original: yādṛśam iti sthitapāṭhābhiprāyeṇānaucityaṃ dattapāṭhāśayena tv aucityam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: yādṛśam iti sthita pāṭha abhiprāyeṇa anaucityam datta pāṭha āśayena tu aucityam iti arthaḥ
tad śabdena anye parāmṛśyante
sādṛśyam eva iti
tadā yad śabdasya napuṃsaka tā syāt

original: tasmāt surārivety atra parāmṛśyata iti avivekākṣamaprajñatvāt /
analyzed: tasmāt surārivā iti atra parāmṛśyate iti aviveka akṣama prajña tvāt
tad apahṛtā iti bhaṅgi bhaṇiti vaicitryam parāmṛṣṭam

original: utkaṭena bhaṇitivaicitryeṇa varṇanīyam ācchāditam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: utkaṭena bhaṇiti vaicitryeṇa varṇanīyam ācchāditam iti arthaḥ
tat uktam vakrokti kṛtā laukika alaṅkārān upamānīkṛtya
yadvat tadvat alaṅkāraiḥ bhāsamānaiḥ nija ātmanā
sva śobhā atiśaya anta stham alaṅkāryam prakāśyate
iti aprādhānyam syāt iti

original: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - yadi śabdavyāpāraviṣayasya prādhānyam arthavyāpāraviṣayasya cāprādhānyam iti vyavasthā,
analyzed: ayam bhāvaḥ yadi śabda vyāpāra viṣayasya prādhānyam artha vyāpāra viṣayasya ca aprādhānyam iti vyavasthā

original: tadā trividhasya pratīyamānasya parair dhvanyatvena vyapanirdidiṣṭasyāsmābhir anumeyatvenopapāditasyāprādhānyaṃ prasajyeta tasyārthavyāpāraviṣayatvāt,
analyzed: tadā trividhasya pratīyamānasya paraiḥ dhvanya tvena vyapanirdidiṣṭasya asmābhiḥ anumeya tvena upapāditasya aprādhānyam prasajyeta tasya artha vyāpāra viṣaya tvāt
iṣyate ca prādhānyam

original: tat katham iyaṃ prādhānyāprādhānyapratītir ghaṭata iti /
analyzed: tat katham iyam prādhānya aprādhānya pratītiḥ ghaṭate iti

original: cakrābhighātetyādau ca paryāyokte samāsoktivad gamyamānasyaiva prādhānyaṃ na vācyasyety upapāditaṃ prāk /
analyzed: cakra abhighāta ityādau ca paryāyokte samāsokti vat gamyamānasya eva prādhānyam na vācyasya iti upapāditam prāk
eka abhighāte iti hayagrīva vadhe pāṭhaḥ sthitaḥ

original: sudarśanasya pulliṅgasya prakrāntatvād ya ity anena parāmarśāt /
analyzed: sudarśanasya put liṅgasya prakrānta tvāt yaḥ iti anena parāmarśāt

original: tat tv anavabudhya cakraṃ yadi parāmṛśyate,
analyzed: tat tu an avabudhya cakram yadi parāmṛśyate
tadā yad śabdasya napuṃsaka tā syāt

original: tan murārir evātra parāmṛśyata ity āśayena cakrābhighāteti paṭhanti /
analyzed: tat murāriḥ eva atra parāmṛśyate iti āśayena cakra abhighāta iti paṭhanti
na tu ayam tatra prastāvaḥ

original: tadapekṣayaiva prādhānyam aprādhānyaṃ ceti iha gamakam apradhānam upāyatvāt /
analyzed: tad apekṣayā eva prādhānyam aprādhānyam ca iti iha gamakam apradhānam upāya tvāt
gamyam pradhānam upeya tvāt
tena pratīyamānasya gamya tvāt prādhānya vyavahāraḥ
na prati iti apekṣayā iti
śabdena arthena ca yā pratītiḥ
tad apekṣayā na prādhānya aprādhānya vyavahāraḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tayas tv iha gamyagamakabhāvaviviktaviṣayatvena cintā kṛtā /
analyzed: tayaḥ tu iha gamya gamaka bhāva vivikta viṣaya tvena cintā kṛtā
tad apekṣayā eva ca iti
vācyasya api yaḥ śābda tvena prādhānya vyavahāra yogaḥ tasya api
tad apekṣayā gamya gamaka tva apekṣayā

original: kva cid yatra pratīyamānasadbhāvas tatrāprādhānyam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: kva cit yatra pratīyamāna sadbhāvaḥ tatra aprādhānyam iti arthaḥ

original: vācyaṃ hi pratīyamānaṃ prati gamakatvena vyavasthitaṃ tena tadapekṣatvenāprādhānyam iti tātparyam /
analyzed: vācyam hi pratīyamānam prati gamaka tvena vyavasthitam tena tad apekṣa tvena aprādhānyam iti tātparyam

original: vicitrā bhaṅgibhiṇitaya iti yathā bhaṭṭabāṇasya teṣu teṣu sthāneṣu /
analyzed: vicitrāḥ bhaṅgi bhiṇitayaḥ iti yathā bhaṭṭabāṇasya teṣu teṣu sthāneṣu
abhibhūyamāna tvāt iti
yat uktam dhvanikṛtā
avyutpatti kṛtaḥ doṣaḥ śaktyā saṃvriyate kaveḥ

original: iti / vākyabhedāc ceti vākyāntarāpekṣayā hi vākyāntarasya bhaṅgibhaṇitivaicitryam ity aṃśena pratītivaidūryān na prakramabhedadoṣaṃ prakāśayati
analyzed: iti vākya bhedāt ca iti vākya antara apekṣayā hi vākya antarasya bhaṅgi bhaṇiti vaicitryam iti aṃśena pratīti vaidūryāt na prakrama bheda doṣam prakāśayati
nyāya siddha tvāt iti
nyāyaḥ tra bhaṇiti vaiṣamyam
kāraṇa bhedasya api iti na kevalam pratīti bhedaḥ bheda hetuḥ
yāvat kāraṇa bhedaḥ pi
pratīti bhedaḥ vijñapti apekṣayā bheda hetuḥ

original: kāraṇabhedaḥ punar utpattyapekṣayeti viśeṣaḥ / tad uktam -
analyzed: kāraṇa bhedaḥ punar utpatti apekṣayā iti viśeṣaḥ tat uktam

original: ayam eva bhedo bhedahetur vā bhāvānāṃ yo 'yaṃ viruddhadharmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇabhedaś ca
analyzed: ayam eva bhedaḥ bheda hetuḥ vā bhāvānām yaḥ yam viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ kāraṇa bhedaḥ ca
iti iha bhaṅgi bhaṇiti vaicitrya avaicitrye pratīti pariskhalana askhalanayoḥ kāraṇe
sa ca iti prakrama bhedaḥ

original: śābdaś cārthaś ceti pūrvaṃ prakṛtyādiprakramabhedavilakṣaṇau śābdārthaprakramabhedau lakṣitāv udāhṛtau ca /
analyzed: śābdaḥ ca arthaḥ ca iti pūrvam prakṛti ādi prakrama bheda vilakṣaṇau śābda artha prakrama bhedau lakṣitau udāhṛtau ca

original: adhunā vācyapratīyamānārthāpekṣayā paryavasānābhiprāyeṇa sarvaprakramabhedavyāpakau sāmānyena śābdārthaprakramabhedāv uktāv iti viśeṣo boddhavyaḥ
analyzed: adhunā vācya pratīyamāna artha apekṣayā paryavasāna abhiprāyeṇa sarva prakrama bheda vyāpakau sāmānyena śābdārtha prakrama bhedau uktau iti viśeṣaḥ boddhavyaḥ
vastu prakrama bhedaḥ iti

original: vastu varṇanīyaṃ yathā varṇayituṃ prakrāntaṃ tasya tathā nirvāhābhāvād vastuprakramabhedaḥ /
analyzed: vastu varṇanīyam yathā varṇayitum prakrāntam tasya tathā nirvāha abhāvāt vastu prakrama bhedaḥ
bhedena iti avayava saṃbandhi tvena iti arthaḥ

original: prathame hi pāde avayavina eva svarūpeṇa varṇanaṃ prakrāntam ity avayavisaṃbandhitvena nirvāhaṇaṃ doṣaḥ /
analyzed: prathame hi pāde avayavinaḥ eva sva rūpeṇa varṇanam prakrāntam iti avayavi saṃbandhi tvena nirvāhaṇam doṣaḥ
ubhayatra api iti avayavi varṇane avayava varṇane ca
tat svarūpam nāyikā svarūpam
aṅgena iti āmantraṇam
patatu adhastāt gacchatu

original: sādṛśyapratipādaneti dvicandram iti hi pāṭhe vadanena saha candro nabhaso dvicandratām āpādayati /
analyzed: sādṛśya pratipādana iti dvi candram iti hi pāṭhe vadanena saha candraḥ nabhasaḥ dvi candra tām āpādayati

original: tac ca vadanacandrayoḥ sādṛśyamūlam iti vyatirekaprakrame sādṛśyanirvāhāt prakramabhedaḥ /
analyzed: tat ca vadana candrayoḥ sādṛśya mūlam iti vyatireka prakrame sādṛśya nirvāhāt prakrama bhedaḥ

original: vastusargapaunaruktyasyeti punaruktavastuvirasa ity atra hi punaruktavastubhir virasa iti vyākhyāne sādṛśyena nirvāhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vastu sarga paunaruktyasya iti punarukta vastu virasaḥ iti atra hi punarukta vastubhiḥ virasaḥ iti vyākhyāne sādṛśyena nirvāhaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: vyatirekeṇa ca prakrama iti doṣa evāyam vimukha iti /
analyzed: vyatirekeṇa ca prakramaḥ iti doṣaḥ eva ayam vimukhaḥ iti

original: ke cit punaruktavastuṣu virasaḥ punaruktāni vastūni na karotīti vyākhyānena vyatirekanirvāhād yathāsthitapāṭhaṃ samarthayāṃ cakre /
analyzed: ke cit punar ukta vastuṣu virasaḥ punar uktāni vastūni na karoti iti vyākhyānena vyatireka nirvāhāt yathāsthita pāṭham samarthayāṃ cakre
artha doṣāṇām iti prakrama atikrama rūpāṇām iti arthaḥ
tapena varṣāḥ iti
tapena varṣāḥ śaradā himāgamo
vasanta lakṣmyā śiśiraḥ sametya ca

original: prasūnakṛtyaṃ dadataḥ sadartavaḥ pure 'sya vāstavyakuḍumbitāṃ dadhuḥ //
analyzed: prasūna kṛtyam dadataḥ sat artavaḥ pure vāstavya kuḍumbi tām

original: atra hi strīpuruṣayugalatrayarūpatayā ṛtūnāṃ varṇane prastute strīrūpāṇām ṛtunāṃ tṛtīyāsaṃbandhād aprādhānye vivakṣite yat tapena varṣā ity  #
analyzed: atra hi strī puruṣa yugala traya rūpa tayā ṛtūnām varṇane prastute strī rūpāṇām ṛtunām tṛtīyā saṃbandhāt aprādhānye vivakṣite yat tapena varṣāḥ iti
atra viparyayaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: kṛte vā tathā nirdeśe śaradā himāgama ityādau yad anyathākaraṇaṃ,
analyzed: kṛte vā tathā nirdeśe śaradā hima āgamaḥ ityādau yat anyathā karaṇam
sa prakrama bhedaḥ eva

original: yadi paraṃ strīpuṃsayor atra yena krameṇa prakramaḥ tasyānyathā nirvāhāt kramaprakramabhedam imaṃ vidmaḥ /
analyzed: yadi param strīpuṃsayoḥ atra yena krameṇa prakramaḥ tasya anyathā nirvāhāt krama prakrama bhedam imam vidmaḥ
tena pūrvam krama prakrama bhedasya idam evā udāharaṇam deyam

original: tena varaṃ ghanaśriyoṣṇaḥ śaradā himāgamaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ /
analyzed: tena varam ghana śriyā uṣṇaḥ śaradā hima āgamaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ
kartṛ prakrama bhedaḥ pi iti

original: yatra yuṣmadasmadarthagataṃ kartṛtvaṃ śeṣe 'tra cetane 'cetane vā vaktrā buddhipūrvakam evāropyate,
analyzed: yatra yuṣmad asmat artha gatam kartṛ tvam śeṣe cetane cetane vā vaktrā buddhi pūrvakam eva āropyate

original: tatra kartur anyasyāropaś cārutvāya vyatyāso guṇa evety arthaḥ /
analyzed: tatra kartuḥ anyasya āropaḥ cāru tvāya vyatyāsaḥ guṇaḥ eva iti arthaḥ
tayoḥ iti
yatra kartṛ vyatyāsa prakrama bhedayoḥ
na prakaraṇa avasite iti

original: yuṣmadasmadarthasya hi kva cit kartṛtvaṃ prakaraṇādyavasitaṃ na śabdenābhidhātuṃ prakrāntam iti nāyaṃ prakramabhedadoṣasya viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: yuṣmad asmad arthasya hi kva cit kartṛ tvam prakaraṇa ādi avasitam na śabdena abhidhātum prakrāntam iti na ayam prakrama bheda doṣasya viṣayaḥ

original: anyatrāropyaivam uktam iti śeṣatvena vivakṣite rāmabhadre /
analyzed: anyatra āropya evam uktam iti śeṣa tvena vivakṣite rāmabhadre

original: evam uttaratra bhārgave vaṭau cānyatvaṃ yojanīyam /
analyzed: evam uttaratra bhārgave vaṭau ca anya tvam yojanīyam

original: nanu yuṣmadasmadarthasya cetanatvāt tadapekṣayācetanasyaivānyatvam ucitam iti kathaṃ cetanasyaivānyatvam ity āha - dvividho hīti /
analyzed: nanu yuṣmad asmat arthasya cetana tvāt tad apekṣayā acetanasya eva anyatvam ucitam iti katham cetanasya eva anyatvam iti āha dvividhaḥ hi iti
ayam bhāvaḥ
na yuṣmad asmat artha gata cetana tva apekṣayā vastu antarasya anya tvam
api tu yuṣmad asmad artha tva apekṣayā eva

original: yuṣmadasmadarthau ca kramāt saṃbodhyamānavastuniṣṭhaḥ parabhāvo 'smitākhyā pratyaktā ca /
analyzed: yuṣmad asmad arthau ca kramāt saṃbodhyamāna vastu niṣṭhaḥ smita ākhyā pratyaktā ca
tatas ca tad apekṣayā śeṣasya anya tvam

original: tasya ca cetanatvācetanatvād dvaividhyam iti na virodhaḥ kaś cit /
analyzed: tasya ca cetana tva acetana tvāt dvaividhyam iti na virodhaḥ kaḥ cit

original: paraśunā candrahāsa iti krameṇa dvayor api yuṣmadasmadarthayor acetanaviṣayakartṛtāvyatyāsa udāharaṇam /
analyzed: paraśunā candrahāsaḥ iti krameṇa dvayoḥ api yuṣmad asmad arthayoḥ acetana viṣaya kartṛ tā vyatyāsaḥ udāharaṇam
bho laṅkeśvaraḥ iti

original: atra rāmaḥ svayaṃ yācata iti asmadarthakartṛtvasya cetanaviṣayavyatyāsasyānyat sthitam apy udāharaṇīyaṃ na cintitaṃ,
analyzed: atra rāmaḥ svayam yācate iti asmad artha kartṛ tvasya cetana viṣaya vyatyāsasya anyat sthitam api udāharaṇīyam na cintitam
pūrvam udāharaṇa antare cintita tvāt
cintā antara prastāvāt ca

original: tad evam iyatā prabandhena prakramabhedaṃ vicārya kramaprāptaṃ kramabhedaṃ vicārayitum āha kramebhedo yatheti /
analyzed: tat evam iyatā prabandhena prakrama bhedam vicārya krama prāptam krama bhedam vicārayitum āha kramebhedaḥ yathā iti

original: nanu yadi smṛtiparāmarśakasya tacchabdasyānubhūta evārtho viṣaya ity ucyate,
analyzed: nanu yadi smṛti parāmarśakasya tad śabdasya anubhūtaḥ eva arthaḥ viṣayaḥ iti ucyate

original: ye 'tyantaparokṣā rāmādayas teṣāṃ kavinā kāvye tacchabdena kathaṃ parāmarśaḥ kriyate teṣām atīndriyatvād ity āha atra ca pratītimātram iti
analyzed: ye tyanta parokṣāḥ rāma ādayaḥ teṣām kavinā kāvye tad śabdena katham parāmarśaḥ kriyate teṣām atīndriya tvāt iti āha atra ca pratīti mātram iti
ayam atra abhiprāyaḥ
yena vinā yat na upapadyate

original: smṛtiś ca pratītimātram antareṇānupapadyamānā tadapekṣiṇī syāt,

original: asyārthaḥ - yathāsmai rocate viśvaṃ tathedaṃ parivartate iti nyāyenātrātiprauḍhatayā granthakāro nijāyattāṃ padārthavyavasthāṃ karttum ārabdhaḥ,
analyzed: asya arthaḥ yathā asmai rocate viśvam tathā idam parivartate iti nyāyena atra ati prauḍha tayā granthakāraḥ nija āyattām padārtha vyavasthām karttum ārabdhaḥ

original: yena tadaṃśunicitaḥ iti tat tamasām iti ca śaśāṅkasya niśāyāś ca tacchabdena parāmarśam aghaṭamānam api samarthayate,
analyzed: yena tad aṃśu nicitaḥ iti tat tamasām iti ca śaśāṅkasya niśāyāḥ ca tad śabdena parāmarśam a ghaṭamānam api samarthayate

original: jakṣur bisaṃ ghṛtavikāsibisaprasūnā ity atra ca bisaprasūnaśabdasya saṃjñāpadasyāpi bisaśabdāśrayeṇa sūkṣmekṣikayā paunaruktyaṃ doṣam udbhāvayati
analyzed: jakṣuḥ bisam ghṛta vikāsi bisa prasūnāḥ iti atra ca bisa prasūna śabdasya saṃjñā padasya api bisa śabda āśrayeṇa sūkṣma īkṣikayā paunaruktyam doṣam udbhāvayati
na ca etat samarthanam hṛdaya hāri

original: yasmāc chaśāṅkamaulir iti ca niśāpatimaulir iti ca saṃjñāśabdāv etau /
analyzed: yasmāt śaśāṅka mauliḥ iti ca niśāpati mauliḥ iti ca saṃjñā śabdau etau

original: saṃjñāśabdānāṃ ca vidyamānasyāpy arthānugamasya na prayojakatvaṃ rūḍheḥ prādhānyāt /
analyzed: saṃjñā śabdānām ca vidyamānasya api artha anugamasya na prayojaka tvam rūḍheḥ prādhānyāt

original: tataś cātra na śaśāṅkārtho na niśārthaḥ kaś cit /
analyzed: tatas ca atra na śaśāṅka arthaḥ na niśā arthaḥ kaḥ cit

original: kiṃ tūpāyamātreṇaitāv arthāv āśritya saṃjñiviśeṣa evātra vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: kim tu upāya mātreṇa etau arthau āśritya saṃjñi viśeṣaḥ eva atra vivakṣitaḥ

original: evaṃ ca saṃjñyantargatayoḥ śaśāṅkaniśayos tacchabdaparāmarśena sahṛdayahṛdayāny āvarjayatīti haṭhasarmathanam etat /
analyzed: evam ca saṃjñī antargatayoḥ śaśāṅka niśayoḥ tad śabda parāmarśena sahṛdaya hṛdayāni āvarjayati iti haṭha sarmathanam etat

original: kiṃ ca śaśāṅkamaulir ity atra varaṃ śaśāṅkasya bhavatu sarvanāmnā parāmarśaḥ tasya vakrākṛtes tatra saṃnihitatvāt,
analyzed: kim ca śaśāṅka mauliḥ iti atra varam śaśāṅkasya bhavatu sarvanāmnā parāmarśaḥ tasya vakra ākṛteḥ tatra saṃnihita tvāt

original: niśāpatimaulir ity atra tu niśāyāḥ parāmarśaḥ pāpāt pāpīyān niśāpater evoktakrameṇa tatra saṃnihitatvāt /
analyzed: niśāpati mauliḥ iti atra tu niśāyāḥ parāmarśaḥ pāpāt pāpīyān niśāpateḥ eva ukta krameṇa tatra saṃnihita tvāt
niśāyāḥ upalakṣaṇa mātra tvena upayoginyāḥ tatra saṃbhava abhāvāt

original: yatra ca tasyā eva na saṃbhavas tatra kā vārtā tamasām /
analyzed: yatra ca tasyāḥ eva na saṃbhavaḥ tatra kā vārtā tamasām
tat ayam andhaḥ maṇim avindat

original: tam anaṅgulir āvayad iti nyāya āyāt /
analyzed: tam anaṅguliḥ āvayat iti nyāyaḥ āyāt

original: api ca yatra prasāritānugamena śabdena saṃjñinaḥ pratyāyanaṃ kriyate,
analyzed: api ca yatra prasārita anugamena śabdena saṃjñinaḥ pratyāyanam kriyate
param tatra anugama utkarṣāt bhavati sarvanāma parāmarśaḥ yathā
utsavāya jagataḥ sa jāyatām rohiṇīramaṇa khaṇḍa maṇḍanaḥ

original: tatprabhābhir iva pūritaṃ vapur bhāti yasya sitabhasmaguṇṭhitam //
analyzed: tad prabhābhiḥ iva pūritam vapuḥ bhāti yasya sita bhasma guṇṭhitam

original: iti / atra hi pādavyāpinī saṃjñānvarthatvam evotkarṣayati /
analyzed: iti atra hi pāda vyāpinī saṃjñā anvartha tvam eva utkarṣayati
tena atra parāmarśaḥ na apratīti karaḥ

original: prakṛte tu tādṛśy api gatir nāsti /
analyzed: prakṛte tu tādṛśī api gatiḥ na asti
āstām vā prakṛtam

original: atrāpi hi rohiṇīramaṇetyādau yadi sūkṣmekṣikā kriyate tadā saṃjñāprādhānyāt tadaṃśasya sarvanāmaparāmarśo nāduṣṭatām bhajate /
analyzed: atrā api hi rohiṇīramaṇa ityādau yadi sūkṣmā īkṣikā kriyate tadā saṃjñā prādhānyāt tad aṃśasya sarvanāma parāmarśaḥ na aduṣṭatām bhajate
prakṛte tu pāpāt pāpīyān parāmarśaḥ
kṛtam ca atra samarthanam granthakṛtā

original: tad etad asya viśvam agaṇanīyaṃ manyamānasya svātmanaḥ sarvotkarṣaśālitākhyāpanam iti /
analyzed: tat etat asya viśvam agaṇanīyam manyamānasya sva ātmanaḥ sarva utkarṣa śāli tā khyāpanam iti

original: granthakarttuḥ punar ayam āśayaḥ - iha tu dvividhāḥ saṃjñāśabdāḥ rūḍhā yogarūḍhayaś ca /
analyzed: grantha karttuḥ punar ayam āśayaḥ iha tu dvividhāḥ saṃjñā śabdāḥ rūḍhāḥ yoga rūḍhayaḥ ca

original: tatra rūdḥānām arthānugamābhāvāt tadanusaraṇaṃ na karttavyam /
analyzed: tatra rūdḍānām artha anugama abhāvāt tad anusaraṇam na karttavyam

original: ye tu yogarūḍhayas teṣāṃ yadi yoga utkaṭatāṃ bhajate tadāśrayo vyavahāro na duṣyati /
analyzed: ye tu yoga rūḍhayaḥ teṣām yadi yogaḥ utkaṭa tām bhajate tad āśrayaḥ vyavahāraḥ na duṣyati

original: ata eva nimittabalena pravṛttasya śabdasya nimittāntarbhāve prayogaḥ saugatair niṣiddha eva / yad āhuḥ -
analyzed: atas eva nimitta balena pravṛttasya śabdasya nimitta antarbhāve prayogaḥ saugataiḥ niṣiddhaḥ eva yat āhuḥ
naimittikāḥ śruteḥ artham artham vā aparamārthikam

original: śabdānām anurundhāno na bādhas tena varṇitaḥ //
analyzed: śabdānām anurundhānaḥ na bādhaḥ tena varṇitaḥ

original: iti / evaṃ sthite yogāśrite vyavahāre yadi saṃjñāvayavabhūtārthasyāvyabhicārī kaś cit pratipipādayiṣitaḥ syāt tadā tadabhisaṃbandhāya tasyāvayavasya  #
analyzed: iti evam sthite yoga āśrite vyavahāre yadi saṃjñā avayava bhūta arthasya avyabhicārī kaḥ cit pratipipādayiṣitaḥ syāt tadā tad abhisaṃbandhāya tasya avayavasya
sarvanāma parāmarśaḥ na duṣṭaḥ
yat uktam sarvanāmnā anusaṃdhi vṛtti channasya iti

original: maulir ity atra śaśāṅkāvyabhicāriṇo raśmayaḥ saṃbandhitvena pratipāditāḥ /
analyzed: mauliḥ iti atra śaśāṅka avyabhicāriṇaḥ raśmayaḥ saṃbandhi tvena pratipāditāḥ
niśāpati mauliḥ iti atra niśā avyabhicārīṇi tamāṃsi

original: teṣāṃ cāvāstavatvam api na tathā duṣṭam,
analyzed: teṣām ca avāstava tvam api na tathā duṣṭam
utprekṣā gocara tvena pratipādita tvāt
kevalam pūrvatra saṃjñi saṃbandhī

original: paratra tu saṃbandhisaṃbandhī parāmṛṣṭa iti viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: paratra tu saṃbandhi saṃbandhī parāmṛṣṭaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ

original: tad evaṃ yaugikānāṃ saṃjñāśabdānāṃ yoganimitto vyavahāraḥ kva cit kva cit suvyavasthita eva /
analyzed: tat evam yaugikānām saṃjñā śabdānām yoga nimittaḥ vyavahāraḥ kva cit kva cit su vyavasthitaḥ eva

original: yat tu kuryāṃ harasyāpi pinākapāṇer ity atra pinākapāṇipadasya saṃjñāśabdasya sato 'rthānugamo nivārayiṣyate yena saṃjñāvagamārthaṃ haraśabdaḥ
analyzed: yat tu kuryām harasya api pinākapāṇeḥ iti atra pinākapāṇi padasya saṃjñā śabdasya sataḥ rtha anugamaḥ nivārayiṣyate yena saṃjñā avagama artham hara śabdaḥ
tat na artha anugama abhāva pratipādana pareṇa

original: kiṃ tv anugamyamānasyārthasya saṃrambhāspadatvena vivakṣitatvaṃ pṛthak saṃjñāpadaprayogam
analyzed: kim tu anugamyamānasya arthasya saṃrambha āspada tvena vivakṣita tvam pṛthak saṃjñā pada prayogam

original: antareṇa na nirvahati saṃjñārthasyārthānugamasya ca yugapat prādhānyābhāvād iti dvayaprayoga
analyzed: antareṇa na nirvahati saṃjñā arthasya artha anugamasya ca yugapad prādhānya abhāvāt iti dvaya prayoga
eva evaṃvidheṣu sthāneṣu śasyate iti abhiprāyeṇa

original: prakṛte vastusvarūpamātrapratipādane saṃjñāśabdatve 'py arthānugamānusaraṇam avyāhatam iti /
analyzed: prakṛte vastu svarūpa mātra pratipādane saṃjñā śabda tve pi artha anugama anusaraṇam avyāhatam iti

original: itarathety ubhayavidhayogyatābhāve parāmṛśyapratīter abhāvād ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: itarathā iti ubhayavidha yogyatā abhāve parāmṛśya pratīteḥ abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
atra tu iti
jakṣuḥ bisam iti atra
saṃbandhinaḥ prasūnasya nibandhane upādāne
ārthaḥ iti

original: kriyākārakabhāvasyākhyātapadavācyatvena śābdena krameṇa prastāve 'tra viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa samāsena pra to 'rthaḥ pratīter ārthatvam /
analyzed: kriyā kāraka bhāvasya ākhyāta pada vācya tvena śābdena krameṇa prastāve viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa samāsena pra taḥ ṛthaḥ pratīteḥ ārtha tvam
tat ca aneka prakāram iti tad śabdena paunaruktyam parāmṛṣṭam

original: atra keśāśvābhyāṃ yañchau iti samūhe 'rthe chapratyayaḥ /

original: evaṃ chapratyayaḥ saṃhatiśabdaś ca bhisaḥ prakṛtitvena nirdiṣṭau punar uktau /

original: biseti bisakisalayacchedapātheyā iti tvaguttarāsaṅgām iti ca vācyam /

bahuvrīhi iti matu arthe bahuvrīhi vidhānam
karmadhāraya matu arthīyābhyām iti

analyzed: karmadhāraya matu arthīyau samuccayena avasthitau vṛtti lāghavāt bahuvrīhiṇā bādhyete iti arthaḥ
nanu
bhūma nindā praśaṃsāsu nitya yoge tiśāyane
saṃsarge sti vivakṣāyām bhavanti matup ādayaḥ

original: iti bahavo bhūmādayo 'rthā astyartham anugacchanto mattvarthīyatāviṣayatvenoktāḥ /
analyzed: iti bahavaḥ bhūma ādayaḥ rthāḥ asti artham anugacchantaḥ mattvarthīyatā viṣaya tvena uktāḥ

original: te kim iti na bahuvrīhivācyatvenoktā ity āha mator iti /
analyzed: te kim iti na bahuvrīhi vācya tvena uktāḥ iti āha matoḥ iti
matup grahaṇam matvarthīyānām upalakṣaṇam

original: bhūmādayo hy arthā na kevalebhyo matubādibhyaḥ pratīyante,
analyzed: bhūma ādayaḥ hi arthāḥ na kevalebhyaḥ matup ādibhyaḥ pratīyante

original: kiṃ tu prakraṇādisahāyebhyas tebhya iti na matubādivicāreṇodāhriyante,
analyzed: kim tu prakraṇa ādi sahāyebhyaḥ tebhyaḥ iti na matup ādi vicāreṇa udāhriyante

original: jāmbaveti tadīyeti vanyeti ca taddhitapratyayasya paunaruktyam /

tat mātaṅga iti
vana kariṇām iti ca ṣaṣṭhī samāsena eva taddhita karmadhāraya lakṣaṇa vṛtti dvaya artha pratīteḥ

original: nedam artha iti nātra taddhitasya paunaruktyam /

grāma jana bandhu sahāyebhyaḥ iti samūhe tal pratyayaḥ

original: atra janaśabdenaiva samūhārthapratītes talpratyayarūpāyāḥ prakṛter bahuvacanasya pratyayasya ca paunaruktyam /
analyzed: atra jana śabdena eva samūha artha pratīteḥ tal pratyaya rūpāyāḥ prakṛteḥ bahuvacanasya pratyayasya ca paunaruktyam

original: pūrvavad iti dalatkandaleti lambāmbudam iti phullāmbujā iti ca bahuvrīhiṇaiva bhajaty arthādīnāṃ pratīteḥ punar uktatvam /

viśeṣya mātrā iti viśeṣyasya aviśiṣṭa viśeṣya rūpa tayā viśiṣṭa viśeṣya rūpa tayā vā pratītiḥ

original: tatra viśiṣṭaviśeṣyarūtayā pratītau yatra viśeṣaṇamātrād eva viśeṣyasyaiva pratītiḥ,
analyzed: tatra viśiṣṭa viśeṣya rū tayā pratītau yatra viśeṣaṇa mātrāt eva viśeṣyasya eva pratītiḥ

original: tatra viśeṣyaprayogo na duṣyati yathā tatra prasādād ity atra vakṣyate /
analyzed: tatra viśeṣya prayogaḥ na duṣyati yathā tatra prasādāt iti atra vakṣyate

original: kiṃ tūpāyamatreṇaitāva bhavaśabdasyeti śītakiraṇābharaṇa ity anenaiva pratītatvād bhavārthasya,

original: yathā nidhānagarbhām iva sāgarāmbarām ity atra sāgarāmbarāśabdena medinyāḥ /
analyzed: yathā nidhāna garbhām iva sāgarāmbarām iti atra sāgarāmbarā śabdena medinyāḥ
camūruḥ mṛga viśeṣaḥ

original: ekatarasyeti indravāhanaśabdaprayoge kuthasāmarthyān nāgendrapratītir nāgendraśabdaprayoge ca śuklavarṇasya varṇitatvād indravāhanapratītir  #
analyzed: ekatarasya iti indravāhana śabda prayoge kutha sāmarthyāt nāga indra pratītiḥ nāga indra śabda prayoge ca śukla varṇasya varṇita tvāt indravāhana pratītiḥ
iti ekatarasya eva prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ

original: yatra tad ityādinā viśiṣṭaviśeṣyarūpatayā viśeṣyapratipattim udāharati /

original: haraśabdasyeti pinākapāṇiśabdena haragato viśeṣaḥ pratipādyate yaḥ sarvotkarṣahetutvena vivakṣito na sajñimātram ity arthaḥ /

original: kusumāyudhaśabdo 'pi hi viśeṣaṇam api viśeṣyam avagamayaty avyabhicārāt /

original: atrāpīti pinākapāṇer ity atra liṅuttamapuruṣeṇaiveti asmady uttamaḥ ity atra hi sthāniny apīty anuvartanād aprayukte 'py asmacchabde tadarthasaṃbhave  #
analyzed: atra api iti pinākapāṇeḥ iti atra liṅ uttama puruṣeṇa eva iti asmadi uttamaḥ iti atra hi sthānini api iti anuvartanāt a prayukte pi asmad śabde tad artha saṃbhave
uttama puruṣaḥ bhavati eva
tad anupādānam viśeṣya anupādānam
anyeṣām iti

original: bahuvacanād īdṛkṣu sthāneṣv ekenaivevaśabdena gatārthatvād anyeṣāṃ prayogo viphala ity abhiprāyaḥ /

original: padārthaupamyavivakṣaṇe tu yāvanto viśeṣyabhūtāḥ padārthās tāvanta ivaśabdāḥ prayoktavyāḥ /

original: na tv ardhajaratīyaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ /

original: upamānād eveti ākārasādṛśyena palāśaṃ prati dīyamānād ārdranakhakṣatam ity asmāt /
analyzed: upamānāt eva iti ākāra sādṛśyena palāśam prati dīyamānāt ārdra nakha kṣatam iti asmāt

original: tadviśeṣaṇopādānam iti ramaṇadattam ity ārdranakhakṣataviśeṣaṇopādānaṃ madayāpitalajjayeti pramadāviśeṣaṇopādānaṃ cety arthaḥ /
analyzed: tad viśeṣaṇa upādānam iti ramaṇa dattam iti ārdra nakha kṣata viśeṣaṇa upādānam madayā āpita lajjayā iti pramadā viśeṣaṇa upādānam ca iti arthaḥ

original: yata iti nakhakṣatam ivety upamopakṛtāt surabhivanamālādīnāṃ puṃstvastrītvanirdeśād ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: yatas iti nakha kṣatam iva iti upamā upakṛtāt surabhi vanamālā ādīnām puṃstva strī tva nirdeśāt iti arthaḥ
strīpuṃsa tva anumitiḥ iti prathama vimarśa ukta prakāreṇa vyakteḥ anumiti rūpa tvena upapādita tvāt

original: aindraṃ dhanur iti atyanteti ābhogīti codāharaṇatrayaṃ vaidharmyakrameṇoktam /
analyzed: aindram dhanuḥ iti atyanta iti ābhogi iti ca udāharaṇa trayam vaidharmya krameṇa uktam
upapanna kramasya asya sadbhāvāt
nāyaka tva pratināyaka tve iti
anumīyate iti śeṣaḥ

original: evam aṅganeva maṇistambhāv iti anumīyata iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: evam aṅganā iva maṇi stambhau iti anumīyate iti śeṣaḥ

original: bhogī vāsukeḥ sa eva netram ākarṣaṇarajjus tasya ā samantād yat parivartanarūpo viśeṣeṇa bhramo bhramaṇaṃ,
analyzed: bhogī vāsukeḥ saḥ eva netram ākarṣaṇa rajjuḥ tasya ā samantāt yat parivartana rūpaḥ viśeṣeṇa bhramaḥ bhramaṇam

original: tena mandarasya mūrttiḥ nitambe madhyabhāge valanaṃ parivarttanaṃ tenākulā jātā /
analyzed: tena mandarasya mūrttiḥ nitambe madhya bhāge valanam parivarttanam tena ākulā jātā

original: tathā ābhogi vistāravat yan netraṃ nayanaṃ tasya parivartanaṃ kaṭākṣīkaraṇaṃ sa eva vibhramo vilāsaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ābhogi vistāravat yat netram nayanam tasya parivartanam kaṭākṣīkaraṇam saḥ eva vibhramaḥ vilāsaḥ
mūrttyā samāropita nāyikā vyavahārayā

original: utkalikās taraṅgā ruhiruhikāś ca hṛdayaṃ madhyadeśāś cittaṃ ca /
analyzed: utkalikāḥ taraṅgāḥ ruhiruhikāḥ ca hṛdayam madhyadeśāḥ cittam ca
āroha arthaḥ iti āroḍhum iti pūrvaśloka bhāga gataḥ
hṛdaya arthaḥ ca iti
hṛdayam ambunidheḥ iti atra sthitiḥ
tayoḥ iti ārohaḥ jīva vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ
hṛdayam jīva kāya eka deśa viśeṣaḥ

original: alaṅkārāntaratvam iti sādṛśyāl lakṣaṇā vakroktir ityādiprakāreṇa /
analyzed: alaṅkāra antara tvam iti sādṛśyāt lakṣaṇā vakroktiḥ ityādi prakāreṇa

original: lākṣaṇikahṛdayādiśabdaprayoge svaśabdaṃ vināpy arthāntaraṃ pratīyata ity āha yadartheti /
analyzed: lākṣaṇika hṛdaya ādi śabda prayoge sva śabdam vinā api artha antaram pratīyate iti āha yad artha iti
yatra upameye mbunidhi prabhṛtau

original: yadarthaikāśrayo nāyakādirūpopamānaviṣayo dharmo hṛdayādir āropito lakṣaṇayā bhavet,
analyzed: yad artha eka āśrayaḥ nāyaka ādi rūpa upamāna viṣayaḥ dharmaḥ hṛdaya ādiḥ āropitaḥ lakṣaṇayā bhavet

original: tayor nāyakāder upamānasyāmbunidhyādeś copameyasyopamānopameyabhāvaḥ śābdo neṣyate /

atra eva aparāga ityādinā śābdatve doṣa udāharaṇam āha

original: mūlāny amātyādiprakṛtivargaḥ vṛkṣāvabandhanāni ca unmūlayituṃ sukara iti yojanā /

rūpakam yathā iti

original: atra niṣkāsanam utkaṭatvena gaṇikādharmo rūpakasya sādhakaḥ pramāṇam /

original: paryāyoktīti yena rāhustrīstanayoḥ kārkaśyalakṣmīr vṛthā kṛtety anena bhaṅgyantareṇa rāhoḥ śiraśchedaḥ prakāśita iti tatsādhanam asādhāraṇaṃ  #
analyzed: paryāyokti iti yena rāhu strī stanayoḥ kārkaśya lakṣmīḥ vṛthā kṛtā iti anena bhaṅgi antareṇa rāhoḥ śiraḥ chedaḥ prakāśitaḥ iti tat sādhanam asādhāraṇam

original: padādīti padādigatānām akṣarāṇām anuprāso gumphabhaṅgī darśayan kavīnām atyantavallabha ity arthaḥ /

kala bhāṣiṇī iti
atra kamala īkṣaṇe iti artha anuguṇaḥ pāṭhaḥ

original: śatrur eva śātrava iti prajñāditvāt svārthe 'ṇ /

original: tadrūpaṇam eveti upamāpekṣayā rūpakasya gamyamānaupamyatvāt prayogārhatve 'pi sāmarthyāvagatarūpatvād yatrābhidhānaṃ punar uktaṃ tatropamāyāṃ  #
analyzed: tat rūpaṇam eva iti upamā apekṣayā rūpakasya gamyamāna aupamya tvāt prayoga arha tve pi sāmarthya avagata rūpa tvāt yatra abhidhānam punar uktam tatra upamāyām

original: ivaśabdasyeti mūrcchita iva mūrcchayatīty arthapratīteḥ siddhatvāt /
analyzed: ivaśabdasya iti mūrcchitaḥ iva mūrcchayati iti artha pratīteḥ siddha tvāt

original: viṣādisaṃparkād dhi mohaṃ prāptaḥ parān api mohayatīti prasiddham /
analyzed: viṣa ādi saṃparkāt hi moham prāptaḥ parān api mohayati iti prasiddham

original: ayaṃ mandadyutir iti nidarśanāyāṃ mamevety arthāt pratītaṃ na punar upāttam /
analyzed: ayam manda dyutiḥ iti nidarśanāyām mama iva iti arthāt pratītam na punar upāttam

original: anena yatraikasyaiva viśeṣaṇasyopamānopameyasaṃbandhabādhakam asti tatra pṛthakprayoge 'pi na doṣaḥ, yathā -

paryāyaiḥ iti

original: samāsāntarapadāśrayaṇeneti umā ca mā ca umāme /

original: chāyānihatapadayor iti prathamaṃ chāyāśabdaḥ dvitīyaś nihataśabdaḥ kartavyaḥ syād iti dārṣṭāntikakrameṇaiva dṛṣṭāntāv uktau /
analyzed: chāyā nihata padayoḥ iti prathamam chāyā śabdaḥ dvitīyaḥ nihata śabdaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt iti dārṣṭāntika krameṇa eva dṛṣṭāntau uktau
astu iti chāyā nihata śabdayoḥ prayogaḥ
ubhayoḥ api iti

original: dvandvapūrvakasya bahuvrīher bahuvrīhipūrvakasya vā dvandvasyety arthaḥ /
analyzed: dvandva pūrvakasya bahuvrīheḥ bahuvrīhi pūrvakasya vā dvandvasya iti arthaḥ

original: etac ca dṛṣṭāntagatatvenoktam api dārṣṭāntikagatatvenāpi paryavasānaṃ neyam /
analyzed: etat ca dṛṣṭānta gata tvena uktam api dārṣṭāntika gata tvena api paryavasānam neyam

original: tatpuruṣapūrvasya dvandvasya dvandvapūrvasya vā tatpuruṣasya lakṣaṇānugamaḥ saṃbhavatīti /

yāvadbhiḥ iti padaiḥ iti arthāt
tatpuruṣa lakṣaṇa āśrayeṇa iti prakṛte dvandva lakṣaṇa pūrvakatvam jñeyam

original: evaṃ na dvandvalakṣaṇam ity atra tatpuruṣalakṣaṇapūrvakatvaṃ boddhavyam /

original: atajjātīya iti yatra tatpuruṣaśaṅkā nāstīti pārvatīparameśvarāv ity atrāpi parameśvarapade karmadhārayāśrayaṇadarśanena tatpuruṣapūrvakatvaṃ  #
analyzed: a tad jātīyaḥ iti yatra tatpuruṣa śaṅkā na asti iti pārvatī parameśvarau iti atra api parameśvara pade karmadhāraya āśrayaṇa darśanena tatpuruṣa pūrvaka tvam
yojanīyam
avāntara cintayā iti paunaruktya prastāve samāsa cintayā iti arthaḥ

original: atra mādhavaśabdasya yaugikatve 'pi samṃjñātvena nrūḍher umāmādhavāv iti prayoge
analyzed: atra mādhava śabdasya yaugika tve samṃjñā tvena umā mādhavau iti prayoge

original: umāyā mādhavasya ca spṛṣṭatvena pratītir na tu dvandvapūrvakatatpuruṣārthasyeti dvandvalakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: umāyāḥ mādhavasya ca spṛṣṭa tvena pratītiḥ na tu dvandva pūrvaka tatpuruṣa arthasya iti dvandva lakṣaṇam
na atīva hṛdayaṅgamam iti āhuḥ

original: rekhā hīti rekhā maryādā avadhiḥ sīmeti paryāyāḥ /

tatra heya pakṣa pratikṣepeṇa prayogaḥ yathā saṃsāra iti

original: atra saṃsārasaṃbhavasya nirākaraṇam iti heyasya pratikṣepaḥ /
analyzed: atra saṃsāra saṃbhavasya nirākaraṇam iti heyasya pratikṣepaḥ

original: atra saṃpadaḥ prasaro vistāra ity upādeyasya parigrahaḥ /
analyzed: atra saṃpadaḥ prasaraḥ vistāraḥ iti upādeyasya parigrahaḥ

original: indūdayasyeva saṃnibhā yasyeti atra saṃnibhāśabdaḥ prabhāparyāyo vyākhyātaḥ /
analyzed: indu udayasya iva saṃnibhā yasya iti atra saṃnibhā śabdaḥ prabhā paryāyaḥ vyākhyātaḥ

original: yathā tu dāṇḍo granthas tathā saṃnibhaśabdaḥ sadṛśaparyāyo 'sti tad uktam -
analyzed: yathā tu dāṇḍaḥ granthaḥ tathā saṃnibha śabdaḥ sadṛśa paryāyaḥ u sti tat uktam
iva vat vā ayathā śabdāḥ samāna nibha saṃnibhāḥ

original: iti / tadanusāreṇendūdayena sadṛśa indūdayasaṃnibha iti vyākhyeyam /
analyzed: iti tad anusāreṇa indu udayena sadṛśaḥ indu udaya saṃnibhaḥ iti vyākhyeyam
tad uktyā eva iti avahita tva uktyā iti arthaḥ

original: mūḍhacetana iti mūḍhadhiya iti ca mohanāmno mūḍhatvasya buddhidharmatvāt cetanadhīśabdayoḥ paunaruktyam /
analyzed: mūḍha cetanaḥ iti mūḍha dhiyaḥ iti ca moha nāmnaḥ mūḍha tvasya buddhi dharma tvāt cetana dhī śabdayoḥ paunaruktyam

original: tatsaṃbandhāt tadavagatir iti cetanasaṃbandhāc caitanyāvagatir ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tad saṃbandhāt tad avagatiḥ iti cetana saṃbandhāt caitanya avagatiḥ iti arthaḥ
kṛpā mṛduḥ iti

original: kṛpā cetanadharma iti caitanyavācipadaṃ na kṛtam /
analyzed: kṛpā cetana dharmaḥ iti caitanya vāci padam na kṛtam

original: evaṃ mūḍhāḥ mūḍhaḥ ity atrāpi vācyam /

udita vapuṣi iti paunaruktyam eva anusaṃdhatte

original: manaḥkartṛkatvaṃ pramodaḥ kriyākaraṇaśabdayor iti atra gauḥ śābaleya itivac chokakriyāśabdayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena prayogaḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ kartṛka tvam pramodaḥ kriyā karaṇa śabdayoḥ iti atra gauḥ śābaleyaḥ iti vat śoka kriyā śabdayoḥ sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena prayogaḥ

original: granthakṛtas tu viśeṣasyaivopayogāt sāmānyāvyabhicārāc ca kriyāśabdasya vaiyarthyam karaṇaśabdasya kriyāvācitvān niṣphalatvam iti śokaśabda  #
analyzed: granthakṛtaḥ tu viśeṣasya eva upayogāt sāmānya avyabhicārāt ca kriyā śabdasya vaiyarthyam karaṇa śabdasya kriyā vāci tvāt niṣphala tvam iti śoka śabda
eva karttavyaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: vaiśeṣikās tu jaḍam evātmaguṇam ekārthasamavāyinā jñānena grāhyaṃ sukham āhuḥ /
analyzed: vaiśeṣikāḥ tu jaḍam eva ātma guṇam eka artha samavāyinā jñānena grāhyam sukham āhuḥ
tad prakriyāyām kartavyam eva anubhava grahaṇam
ekasya iti sāgarasya
itarasya ca iti uttārārthasya
tad rūpa tā avagateḥ iti ubhayatra vācyam

original: atra samābhātīty ekaṃ padaṃ gaṇitam upasargāṇāṃ dyotyapāratantryeṇa pṛthakpadārhatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: atra samābhāti iti ekam padam gaṇitam upasargāṇām dyotya pāratantryeṇa pṛthak pada arha tva abhāvāt

original: ekādiprayoge satīti ekasya prayogābhyupagame 'nyeṣām eva tattvam /
analyzed: eka ādi prayoge sati iti ekasya prayoga abhyupagame nyeṣām eva tattvam
tatra api eka tvam aniyatam

original: tathāpy avivekasyāvimṛśyakāritvaprayojakatvāt tasya kāraṇatve 'py avimṛśyakāritvam eva kāraṇam uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tathā api avivekasya avimṛśyakāri tva prayojaka tvāt tasya kāraṇa tve pi avimṛśyakāri tvam eva kāraṇam uktam bhavati

original: na hīti yasmin sati vahnau dhūma ityādike pratibandhakālabhāviny anvaye sati viśeṣaṇasya yasya asati vahnau na dhūma ityādivyatirekasya gatiḥ
analyzed: na hi iti yasmin sati vahnau dhūmaḥ iti ādike pratibandha kāla bhāvini anvaye sati viśeṣaṇasya yasya asati vahnau na dhūmaḥ ityādi vyatirekasya gatiḥ

original: tasyānvayasya sa eva vyatireko hetur yuktaḥ vayavasthitasya hetuhetumadbhāvasya vaiparītyaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: tasya anvayasya saḥ eva vyatirekaḥ hetuḥ yuktaḥ hetu hetumat bhāvasya vaiparītya prasaṅgāt

original: anvayapratītihetuko hi vyatirekapratītyupakramo na tu viparyayaḥ /
analyzed: anvaya pratīti hetukaḥ hi vyatireka pratīti upakramaḥ na tu viparyayaḥ

original: viśeṣaṇāc ceti guṇalubdhā iti sādhāraṇatvād ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇāt ca iti guṇa lubdhāḥ iti sādhāraṇa tvāt iti arthaḥ
sāmarthyā iti
dvividham paunaruktyam artha gatam śabda gatam ca iti
tatra arthasya sāmarthya siddha tve rtha gatam gauṇam āmukhe paunaruktya anavabhāsāt
śabda gatam ā sukha avabhāsamāna tvāt mukhyam

original: prakṛtipratyayārthasyeti prakṛtyarthaḥ pratyayārthaḥ prakṛtipratyayasamudāyārtha iti vyastasamastatvena yojyam /
analyzed: prakṛti pratyaya arthasya iti prakṛti arthaḥ pratyaya arthaḥ prakṛti pratyaya samudāya arthaḥ iti vyasta samasta tvena yojyam

original: evaṃ prakṛteḥ pratyayasya cety atrāpi vācyam /
analyzed: evam prakṛteḥ pratyayasya ca iti atra api vācyam
anyathā prāc nirdiṣṭasya pañcavidhasya paunaruktyasya asaṅgrahaḥ syāt
vihitasya iti

original: vastuvṛttyā sthitasya bahuvrīher yā karmadhārayaśaṅkā tayā matvarthīyādiḥ śabdaḥ kṛto bisakisalayacchedapātheyavanta ityādau /
analyzed: vastu vṛttyā sthitasya bahuvrīheḥ yā karmadhāraya śaṅkā tayā matvarthīya ādiḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ bisa kisalaya cheda pātheyavantaḥ ityādau
tasya sphuṭam paunaruktyam vṛtti dvayasya gauravāt

original: yasminn iti jāmbavapallavādaunītyādau yasmin pallavaśabda ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: yasmin iti jāmbava pallava ādauni ityādau yasmin pallava śabdaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tathā ambunidher mamanthe ityādau yasya kāmukasya saṃbandhaṃ yad hṛdayādi tetyanānvito 'mbudhilakṣaṇo yaś cārthaḥ,

taruḥ iva iti atra

original: vākyabhedaprasaṅgād iti saṃbhavaty ekavākyatve vākyabhedaś ca neṣyate iti vākyabhedasya pratipattigauravavattvād dheyatvam /
analyzed: vākya bheda prasaṅgāt iti saṃbhavati eka vākya tve vākya bhedaḥ ca na iṣyate iti vākya bhedasya pratipatti gauravavat tvāt dheya tvam
atha samāsokti iti
anavarata jala ityādeḥ viśeṣaṇasya dvi artha tvāt
upamāna bhūtā iti
yatra upamāna bhūtasya dharmiṇaḥ nyasya arthasya gamyamāna tvam tatra samāsoktiḥ
na sākṣāt upādāne iti arthaḥ
kva cit iti
babhravaḥ kapilāḥ

original: etad dāvāgniviśeṣaṇaṃ san nakulalakṣaṇam arthaṃ pratipādayatīti dharmidharmobhayātmatvam /
analyzed: etat dāva agni viśeṣaṇam sat nakula lakṣaṇam artham pratipādayati iti dharmi dharma ubhaya ātmatvam
evam hariṇāḥ haritāḥ mṛgāḥ ca
jaṭāḥ mūlāni keśa saṃniveśāḥ ca
valkalam vṛkṣa tvac tad kṛtam ca vāsaḥ
kapilāḥ piṅgalāḥ muni viśeṣāḥ ca
āropa viṣaya bahu tvāt āropyamānānām api bahu tvam
kesariṇam bakula puṣpavantam siṃham ca
vasantam mādhavam nivasantam ca
abhimānaḥ dhārā adhirūḍhaḥ mānaḥ mahā pramāṇaḥ ca
durvāraṇaḥ śakyavāraṇaḥ duṣṭaḥ ca karī
mattaḥ mad sakāśāt samadaḥ ca

original: abhimāna iti na tathā hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
analyzed: abhimānaḥ iti na tathā hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ

original: anyonyam iti vasantam ity asya kesariṇam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ,
analyzed: anyonyam iti vasantam iti asya kesariṇam iti viśeṣaṇam

original: siṃhapakṣe ca kesariṇam ity asya vasantam iti /
analyzed: siṃha pakṣe ca kesariṇam iti asya vasantam iti

original: rūpyeti yaḥ kesarī pratītaḥ sa vasantasya rūpakatvena na tāṭasthyena /
analyzed: rūpya iti yaḥ kesarī pratītaḥ sa vasantasya rūpaka tvena na tāṭasthyena

original: evaṃ vasantam ity asya nivasanārthayoge 'pi vasantārthaḥ kesariṇo rūpakatvena yojanīyaḥ /
analyzed: evam vasantam iti asya nivasana artha yoge vasanta arthaḥ kesariṇaḥ rūpaka tvena yojanīyaḥ
ittham eva durvāraṇa abhimānayoḥ vācyam
viśeṣya tvena rūpya tvena ca svatantra tvam
tad viparyayeṇa paratantra tvam
viśeṣya ādi ātmaka iti
ādi grahaṇena rūpya rūpaka bhāvaḥ gṛhyate
tilakaḥ taru viśeṣaḥ tilakaḥ ca viśeṣakaḥ
tad abhivyaktiḥ ubhaya artha abhivyaktiḥ
tayoḥ ubhayoḥ arthayoḥ

original: guṇavanto rajjuyuktā api ghaṭakāḥ saṅghaṭayitāro hrasvāś ca ghaṭāḥ /
analyzed: guṇavantaḥ rajju yuktāḥ api ghaṭakāḥ saṅghaṭayitāraḥ hrasvāḥ ca ghaṭāḥ
pārthivāḥ rājānaḥ

original: na tu vakṣyamāṇayuktyā pṛthivīvikārā vyākhyeyāḥ guṇavattvaghaṭakatvayor iti /
analyzed: na tu vakṣyamāṇa yuktyā pṛthivī vikārāḥ vyākhyeyāḥ guṇavat tva ghaṭaka tvayoḥ iti

original: yady apy atra samīhitasiddhau hetutvena vyavasthitasya ghaṭakā ity asya pārthivā iti prati viśeṣaṇatvaṃ,
analyzed: yadi api atra samīhita siddhau hetu tvena vyavasthitasya ghaṭakāḥ iti asya pārthivāḥ iti prati viśeṣaṇa tvam

original: tathāpi kūpa ivety upamāsāmarthyād viśeṣyatvam api ghaṭate //
analyzed: tathā api kūpaḥ iva iti upamā sāmarthyāt viśeṣya tvam api ghaṭate
